channel.desc: Science lovers, Nature and History buffs: this is your channel! Voyager Documentaries takes you into Earth’s wildest corners, the forbidding realms of deep space, and the dramatic turning points of history.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: In the forests of the Appalachians, there lives a rare and still unidentified creature. Physically imposing, with traits characteristic of wolves, bears and gorillas; this strange monster strikes fear into peoples hearts. Some think it a werewolf.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: A mythical snake-like creature lives in the waters of Lake Seljordsvalnet in Norway. The monster measures some 20 meters in length, with a greenish tint and a raised back; Named Selma, she has been terrifying residents of the lake since the 18th century.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: In a lake just a hundred miles from Loch Ness, you may find the monster of Loch Morar. Known as Morag, it has avoided the limelight and tourists partly because no road goes around the lake...but also because seeing Morag is supposedly an omen of death.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: The Dobhar Chu is a mythical monster that has inhabited British lakes since ancient times. Thought to be a cross between a giant otter and a hound, the Dobhar Chu is about seven feet long, or about the size of a crocodile.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: On the coast of Queensland, Australia, rumors of something unique have haunted locals for centuries. Aboriginal cave paintings depict a large and furry bipedal monster. European colonists reported a similar creature stalking the woods. What is Yowie?

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: The beauty of Australia’s Byron Bay attracts over one million visitors per year. However, they probably don’t suspect the presence of a mysterious creature known locally as the Devil Dog. It could be an animal long thought extinct, the Tasmanian tiger.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: A hairy, aggressive monster is said to haunt northern New Zealand. The Maori named it Moehau, in honor of the highest peak in a nearby mountain range. This half-man, half-gorilla is a true New Zealand legend, just as Bigfoot is for North Americans.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: A monster has terrorized Belize for centuries. It is described as a small man, three-feet tall, with an ugly face, hands without thumbs and inverted feet. According to legend it wears a red hat, dresses in animal skins and carries a menacing machete.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: For almost two centuries, tourists have been flocking to the waters of Lake Champlain hoping against the odds to glimpse the lake monster they’ve affectionately dubbed Champ. Learn about one of the oldest monster legends in the world.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: The Mothman legend captivates tourists from all over the world, who pilgrimage to Point Pleasant, West Virginia, to visit sighting locations, question locals and tour the Mothman museum or buy Mothman memorabilia. The monster is now a local celebrity.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: What is it about sleepy Adams, Tennessee, that attracts tourists eager to visit graveyards, haunted caves and cabins, swap scary stories and try to summon the spirits of the dead? The legend of the Bell Witch and a 200-year old haunting are they key.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: A 19th century legend has put the town of Rhinelander, Wisconsin on the map, a must-visit location for those interested in American folklore and the supernatural, as Rhinelander is the home of the Hodag, a mythical beast transformed into a town mascot.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: Each year, tourists with no interest in skiing or scenic views flock to the Austrian town of Klagenfurt to do a different kind of sightseeing: they’re after a glimpse of the legendary Tatzelwurm creature, or the chance to drink a beer and discuss it.

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: The town of Willow Creek, California takes the legend of Bigfoot more seriously than anywhere else in the world. An ape-like monster believed to be the missing link, there are organized hunting expeditions, statues, and even a museum. But how real is it?

programme.title: Boogeymen
programme.desc: The city of Kelowna in Okanagan Valley, is home to one of Canada's oldest and most enduring legends. In the depths of Okanagan Lake, a monster known as Ogopogo, described as a 10-15 meter long serpent, has been sighted on and off since the 19th century.

channel.desc: This is kids central where tots to teenagers will enjoy a wide array of engaging, fun, and entertaining shows, movies, and much more.

programme.title: Grossology: Silent But Deadly - Part 1
programme.desc: Gassy super villain, Fartor returns with a scheme to fart-up the entire planet!

programme.title: Grossology: Silent But Deadly - Part 2
programme.desc: Fartor and his new apprentice, Far-Ty join forces to drill into the planet core and turn the earth into one big gas planet.

programme.title: Grossology: The King of Rottingham Forest
programme.desc: Kid Rot returns and his powers are out of control.

programme.title: Grossology: Lights Out
programme.desc: A new nocturnal villain, Darko Crevasse, plunges the city into darkness with the help of his army of creatures of the night.

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Inside Out
programme.desc: Because of the magical powers of a witch's spyglass, the roles of the household inhabitants are reversed: the cockroaches are now as big as Oggy while the cats become as small as the cockroaches! Oggy and Jack try to get the priceless object back.

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Oggy's Double
programme.desc: Oggy is sprinkling the hedges in his garden when he sees a cat, who looks exactly like him, walk past him. He is amazed and he invites the cat over for a cup of tea. The cats look at each other: they are look-alikes! Jack shows up at Oggy's house…

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Night Watchmen
programme.desc: Oggy and Jack are night watchmen in a nuclear power station. The roaches don't want to miss that! They go in the control room, and in two ticks, all the warning lights turn red! Oggy chases after them and ends up in the heart of the reactor...Oops!

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: The Cicada and the Cockroach
programme.desc: During a sunny afternoon, Oggy is driving his scooter, smiling, when a flying insect smashes in his teeth. It is a cicada. Because she is hurt, Oggy picks her up and takes her home to take care of her. Soon the cicada song drives the roaches nuts.

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: The Ancestor
programme.desc: Oggy is gardening peacefully when he suddenly falls into a hole and finds himself in a cave! Lost among several rock paintings, Oggy finds a big and hairy prehistoric cockroach stuck in a block of ice. It won't be long until the roaches unfreeze him!

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Ugly, Dirty and Good
programme.desc: The roaches try to break into the fridge but Oggy cuts off the cable that the insects were climbing to reach their objective. Joey falls and remains lying on the floor. But when Oggy is about to punish him, Joey smiles at him tenderly.

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Just Married!
programme.desc: Jack is getting married, he chooses Oggy as his best man. Even though they haven't been invited, the cockroaches are of course attending the party! Jack gives an anti-cockroaches detector to Oggy to help him get rid of those damn insects.

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Abandoned Cockroaches
programme.desc: Jack and Oggy are on a road trip, heading toward the beach. On the back seat, the roaches are making a huge mess in the car. The cats don't react: they have a plan... When they stop for gas, they abandon the roaches on the highway rest area!

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Moving Out
programme.desc: Oggy has had it with these evil roaches! This time, he's moving out! He rents an apartment downtown while the roaches stay home alone in the empty house which suddenly seems very big. Getting bored, the roaches decide to go see Oggy.

programme.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches: Formula 1
programme.desc: Jack tells Oggy he is going to participate in a Formula 1 ride! One second later, both cats are in the middle of the Grand Prix! The roaches, who followed the two cats, discreetly put a sleeping pill in Jack's glass right before the departure.

channel.desc: Become immersed by fascinating people, oddities, small details, and big facts. Full of insightful and entertaining lifestyle and true crime programmes, reality series full of inspiring characters and fascinating documentaries.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bosco the Clown
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Lost in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog lectures high school students about the dangers of drugs before going after Joseph, a dangerous fugitive who won't be easy to capture.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Suga On My Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog and the team go after Kandice, AKA Candy, AKA Suga, a stripper who didn't make her court appearance. They convince one of her friends to lure her to a supermarket parking lot, where Dog has an easy time fetching the fetching young thing. But then

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mothers and Daughters
programme.desc: Dog and Beth take on the heartbreaking case of Rachel. Rachel's mom bailed her out of jail on condition that she go to AA meetings and stick to a curfew. But Rachel hasn't kept up her end of the bargain, and now her mother wants her back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dog Is Smokin'
programme.desc: Dog is trying to cut down on smoking, but it's not easy with his high-stress job. Today, he must track down Walter, a fugitive who believes that the Canadian military has planted a chip in his tooth that allows him to communicate with his van.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Snooze, You Lose
programme.desc: Beth designs a luxurious new office for the team and shows it off to Dog, but the bounty hunter is more interested in starting his hunt for Federico, who's been revoked for missing court dates and generally running amuck.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Dog goes on his a case, which involves Bobby, who's been on parole for three months pending sentencing on an assault charge. Bobby's girlfriend wants him back in jail, and Dog agrees that the Bobby needs to be behind bars.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Moms & Dads
programme.desc: Dog pursues two people whose lives have been ruined by drugs. First, he tracks Mae, who traded a good home and loving family for an ice pipe. The next case involves Jude. His addiction has caused his pregnant wife to fear for her safety.

programme.title: Pluto TV Inside+
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: To say this channel is full of personalities would be an understatement. If you are looking for loud, outrageous, and straight up mental entertainment--here's your destination.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Viva Paul Vegas
programme.desc: Donnie drags Paul on a last minute trip to check out the site of the new Wahlburgers location in Las Vegas. After their work is done, Donnie tries to get his unlucky brother to loosen up at the casinos--and prays that Paul's jinx isn't contagious.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: A Re-Mark-able Feast
programme.desc: Growing up Mark wouldn't eat anything aside from Alma's cooking or takeout from the local sub shop. Things have changed now that his blockbuster career has taken him all over the world and exposed the once finicky eater to international cuisine.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Wahl Of Fame
programme.desc: When the Mayor asks Paul to participate in Boston's annual Comic-Con, Mark insists Paul take him up on the opportunity.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: On Your Mark...Ted Set...Home!
programme.desc: Mark and his wife Rhea invite Paul to their home in California to work on the Wahlburgers kids' menu in hopes of creating new dishes that can pass muster with Mark's children, and Wahlburgers customers.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Bowling For Burgers
programme.desc: It's Boston's annual Battle of the Burger competition and Donnie is putting pressure on Paul to grill up a win.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Grand Opening, Eh?
programme.desc: The Wahlbergs head to Toronto for the grand opening of the new Wahlburgers. Paul is stressed, as usual, so Donnie heads to Canada to help his brother out, with his wife Jenny and son Elijah by his side.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: License to Grill
programme.desc: Paul takes a trip with his kids to visit Mark, Rhea and the kids in Los Angeles. A simple family BBQ turns into a battle of Wahlberg clans during a game of touch football. Mark utilizes his home field advantage to torment Paul.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Do the Hustle
programme.desc: As part of the ever-expanding Wahlberg empire, Mark searches for new ventures. But when members of his entourage attempt to pitch their own ideas, tempers flare and Mark is caught in the middle.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Krafting a Patriot Burger
programme.desc: Mark pledges to make a Super Bowl Burger for the New England Patriots' owner, Robert Kraft. Paul is excited to honor his hometown team until pals Rob Gronkowski and Julien Edelman request a Boston clam themed burger instead.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Good Vi-Bro-Tions
programme.desc: As two of the busiest brothers in show business, Mark and Donnie are rarely in the same city at the same time. When the NKOTB concert tour intersects with Mark's publicity tour in New York City, they have a chance to reunite.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Drama Meets Drama
programme.desc: The premiere of the Entourage movie gives the real life entourage an opportunity to meet their fictional alter egos.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Not Your Routine Poutine
programme.desc: With the restaurant open in Toronto, Paul must decide on Wahlburger's poutine--a Canadian dish made of French fries, cheese curds and gravy. The NKOTB tour puts Donnie in town to help. In Los Angeles, Mark receives a visit from his older brother, Bob.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: New Kids On The Boardwalk
programme.desc: The highly anticipated opening of a New York Wahlburgers in Coney Island is stuck in last minute delays. Not wanting to postpone the event, Donnie, Mark and Paul move forward with a public celebration all over the famous amusement park while battling.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Matchmaker Mark
programme.desc: Mark's friends are constantly looking to him for advice so when "Big A" lands a date of course he turns to Mark. Using some high tech audio gear, Mark is able to feed "Big A" lines during his lunch date. Back at Wahlburgers, Paul is stumped.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Directing Drama
programme.desc: When Johnny Drama looks to take his music career to the next level, Mark suggests Drama make a music video that Mark himself will direct.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Family & Faith
programme.desc: Mark flies to Philadelphia to host The Festival of Families to honor Pope Francis where Mark performs the emcee gig of a lifetime. Meanwhile, Alma, Paul and Bob attend the annual Wahlberg family reunion where Brandon gets his first chance to join poker.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Brooklyn Bound Burgers
programme.desc: Donnie promises to bring Wahlburgers to his Blue Bloods co-star Marisa Ramirez and the rest of the cast and crew. Unfortunately, Mark sent Paul to Costa Rica for a much needed vacation. Alma employs Brandon to help Donnie save face.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Bahston Gahden Pahtay
programme.desc: Whenever New Kids on the Block perform in their hometown of Boston, it is a family event.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Wahl Always Have Paris
programme.desc: On a promotional tour in France, Mark invites Paul to Paris so the two of them can do some sightseeing as well as be together for Mark's birthday dinner. Of course, Mark also wants Paul to cook for him and his French-speaking actor friend.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Nurse Alma
programme.desc: Mark, always the prankster, finally gets a dose of his own medicine when he plays golf against Masters Champion and PGA bad boy Bubba Watson. Meanwhile, Alma, Bob and Brandon visit the former hospital where Alma used to work as a nurse.

programme.title: Wahlburgers: Hamburgers and Horsepower
programme.desc: Dale Earnhardt Jr invites Mark out for a NASCAR race in New Hampshire. Mark has Paul and Bob deliver Wahlburgers to top NASCAR drivers, Greg Biffle and Ricky Stenhouse Jr. Meanwhile, Brandon flies out to Chicago to visit Donnie and get a singing lesson.

programme.title: Laguna Beach: Cabo, Cabo, Cabo
programme.desc: The gang heads south of the border to Cabo and things get super spicy when Alex confronts Jessica about hooking up with Jason and the two nearly come to blows.

programme.title: Laguna Beach: Lies and Goodbye
programme.desc: Things get tricky when Talan professes his love to Kristen shortly before Stephen does the same.

programme.title: Laguna Beach: Don't Hate the Game
programme.desc: Kristen hooks up with Jessica's new crush. Stephen and LC share a moment in San Fran.

programme.title: Laguna Beach: Our Last Prom
programme.desc: It's prom time again at LB and the usual hijinx are in full force. Kristin still has no date. Will Talan swoop in and take her, or is it stag city for the blonde bombshell?

programme.title: Laguna Beach: Boys Are Like Purses
programme.desc: LC decides it's time to do what she does best and throw a poolside BBQ. Kristin reluctantly shows up briefly, and Stephen idly watches as Jason steals LC's heart.

programme.title: Laguna Beach: The End of the Beginning
programme.desc: The time has finally come for the gang to graduate high school and leave their LB bubble... mixed emotions run high and the tears start a rolling.

programme.title: Laguna Beach: I Saw You Kiss Her
programme.desc: Jason kisses Jessica and gets busted by LC. Look out!

programme.title: Laguna Beach: Nothing More to Say
programme.desc: LC throws another party and after his moronic actions at the benefit. Jason comes crawling back to apologize, but he can't even do that well.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Food is a food entertainment destination showcasing the shows of the most infamous British TV Chef Gordon Ramsay with his popular Kitchen Nightmares, F Word, Cook along and Culinary Genius shows and much to gorge on.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay gives the contestants a chicken challenge that includes catching live fowl. The winners spend a day riding in go-karts while the losers prepare chickens for the next service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining chefs get a demonstration in dessert preparation using sound waves and liquid nitrogen, then must steam, poach or boil protein-based dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The contestants prepare Hawaiian dishes for a high school's twentieth reunion. The winners spend the day on a yacht while the losers transform Hell's Kitchen to look Hawaiian.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The chefs prepare five dishes that must include at least one type of beer. The winners attend the Long Beach Grand Prix IndyCar race while the losers unload kegs of beer and bags of ice.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The ten budding chefs prepare comfort foods, with Wolfgang Puck judging them. The winners attend a show at L.A.'s Laugh Factory and take a ride in a convertible, while the losers have to clean the dorms.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Contestants need to be at their sweetest when Chef Ramsay gives them a dessert challenge. The winning team flies to Sin City while the losers prep the kitchen for Hell's Kitchen's "Date Night.”

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The remaining chefs are put to a blind taste test. The winners ride horses in the Hollywood Hills while the losers peel grapes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The seven remaining competitors visit New York City, where they tour BLT Steak. When they return to Hell's Kitchen, their challenge is to prepare ethnic dishes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The teams must prepare three dishes. The catch? One must be made in thirty minutes, one in twenty and the last in only ten minutes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: For the first time in "Hell's Kitchen" history, chefs from prior seasons return to compete with the remaining competitors.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode's challenge, each chef must create something special from Alaskan salmon. The winner gets a helicopter ride and lunch at LA's Water Grill. The losers prep fish for the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The final four chefs eat a dish prepared by Chef Ramsay. For their challenge, they must recreate it in 35 minutes. The winner goes to a baseball game while the losers move furniture out of the dorms.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: While wearing new white dinner jackets, the final contestants prepare a menu consisting of four appetizers, four entrees and three desserts.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Eighteen chefs vie for a head chef position at Gordon Ramsay Steak at the Paris Las Vegas hotel and casino. Ramsay splits up the contestants into two teams.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The chefs remove scallops from a mound of ice and seaweed before cooking them to Chef Ramsay's standards. The first team to make six plates of five scallops wins a day of yacht cruising.

channel.desc: On Strongman it is all about raw and sheer power 24/7! In various contests like the World Truck-Pull or Log Lift Championship the strongest men compete against each other in international locations to find out: Who is the strongest among them?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Lithuania
programme.desc: In Vilnius, the city where one of the most powerful strongmen Žydr?nas Savickas lives, strongmen take on classics like tractor pulling and shield carrying. The ‘Big Z’ has won the title four times.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Portugal
programme.desc: In Lithuania, Marius Lalas secured a second win, beating Grzegorz Szyma?ski. Both competitors now have two SCL victories overall. Will either of them secure a third win in Portugal before the World grand finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Martinique
programme.desc: Next stop in our SCL caravan before the grand finale is paradise on Earth – Martinique. Eight strongmen from all over the World compete for the champion’s title and the World grand finals in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: Finals in Turkey
programme.desc: The time has come for the final stage of the MHP Strongman Champions League and the crowning of the World Champion to close the 2015 season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings – Norway - to the first stage of new season of the Strongman Champions League World Series 2016! In a temperature of minus 15 degrees, 12 top class athletes from all over the world fight.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Log lift World championship Lithuania
programme.sub-title: SCL Log lift World championship Lithuania
programme.desc: For third stage of Strongman Champions League World Series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas, Lithuania, for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression. The capacity-filled audience kept the athletes battling to the finish.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Latvia
programme.desc: Last year in Latvia saw the first SCL win for local ‘Titan’ Dainis Zageris. This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year’s injury in Romania, as well as World champion in Log lifting Vidas Blekaitis and the yellow shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: In a very sunny 30 degrees atmosphere, deep in the mountains of Serbia, the SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for stage 6 of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Eleven, including former champion Martin Wildauer.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Bulgaria
programme.desc: Plovdiv, Ancient, second-largest city in Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the Strongman Champions League. Current leader in World Series is Matjaz Belsak, the youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL England 2016
programme.desc: At Guildford Spectrum - a one stop leisure facility where you can enjoy ice skating, ten pin bowling, swimming and a whole range of sporting.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL Finland
programme.desc: Strongmen from all over the globe came to city of Vaasa in Finland, which is famous for its so-called ‘white nights’ to test their strength in the 9th stage of Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League: SCL World championship under 105 kilograms, Finland
programme.sub-title: SCL World championship under 105 kilograms, Finland
programme.desc: A total of 38 athletes from around the world arrive in Kokkola, Finland to compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. 17 complete in the Lightweight World Championship, under 105 kilograms.

programme.title: Strongman

channel.desc: Immerse yourself with a veritable feast of TV Christmas crackers for all of the family from the best Christmas movies and classic Christmas tales.

programme.title: Scrooge (1935)
programme.desc: The Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future appear to Scrooge, taking him on a journey into the very spirit and magic of Christmas itself.

programme.title: Holiday Wishes
programme.desc: Britney, a rich, spoiled child, and Rachel, an orphan, switch bodies after a visit to the mall with Santa Claus. Each girl wakes up as the other - Britney is in the orphanage, and Rachel is at Britney's family's mansion.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Maire prays that her husband find the strength to let go of their 9 year marriage. Billy is asking that his wife receive the strength and wisdom to hold on. A 8-year-old runaway from heaven takes it upon herself to rekindle the romance that slipped away.

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
programme.desc: When Martian children become obsessed with Santa Claus, the Martian elders decide to visit our planet and bring Santa back to Mars. It's not an easy task - first, they must sort through an array of shopping mall Santas!

programme.title: Pete's Christmas
programme.desc: A put-upon teen finds himself reliving the same miserable Christmas day over and over again. Starring: Bruce Dern, Zachary Gordon, Molly Parker, Rick Roberts, Marshall Williams.

programme.title: Santa Claus Presents A Children's Christmas: Santa Claus Presents A Children's Christmas
programme.sub-title: Santa Claus Presents A Children's Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas collection designed especially with children in mind. Stories like Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, The Night Before Chirstmas and more!

programme.title: Christmas in the Smokies
programme.desc: Christmas in the Smokies is a modern day Christmas classic set in the beautiful Smoky Mountains. It tells the story of one family's journey to save their historic berry farm against all odds during one fateful holiday season.

programme.title: Christmas in Mississippi
programme.desc: Photographer Holly returns to Gulfport, Mississippi for Christmas. Their traditional holiday light show has been revived again since a hurricane struck five years earlier. She is shocked to learn the festival is run by her high school sweetheart, Mike.

programme.title: A Family for the Holidays
programme.desc: Becky and her family are always in a hurry and rarely have the time to speak with her sweet, elderly neighbor Grace who always trying to start conversation with her.

channel.desc: MythBusters explodes onto the screen, bringing with it two Hollywood special effects experts Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage & attempt to debunk urban legends. Expect science, experiments, explosions & disasters!

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 36
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is the brace position recommended in airplane crashes actually designed to kill people? Is driving while talking on the phone as dangerous as driving drunk?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 180
programme.desc: Is it impossible for humans to walk in a straight line without a point of reference? Will binary explosives explode in the case of a fender bender?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 197
programme.desc: Can you jump to safety from a collapsing rope bridge as seen in the film "Cliffhanger"? Can a strong enough hailstorm sink a boat?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 115
programme.desc: Is it possible to lift a car using fire hoses? Do goats faint when scared? Can a person create a huge fireball with sawdust and a flare?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 57
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a whirlpool really kill somebody? Can a snow plough driving down the road push enough air to flip a passing car over?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 86
programme.desc: Every so often, the MythBusters draw conclusions that leave the fans seething. It’s time for the MythBusters to put more of their most contentious outcomes under the microscope.

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 172
programme.desc: How well do movie sound effects compare to their real-world counterparts? Can a sailboat stranded in calm water start moving by blowing air into its sail with an onboard fan?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 207
programme.desc: Can you share the task of driving, change places while driving or push the driver out while moving at regular speed? Can you prevent cats from defecating in your garden?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 11
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can an airplane toilet create enough suction to cause a person to become stuck on it? Can a can of biscuit dough explode in a hot car?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 220
programme.desc: Can you herd cats? Can you catch a greased pig? Can you stuff 10 pounds of feces into a 5-pound bag?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 187
programme.desc: If a pressure-triggered bomb is cooled with liquid nitrogen, can its detonation be delayed long enough for a person to seek protection?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 223
programme.desc: Do males prefer women with blonde hair? Do pheromone sprays work? Are women attracted to wealthy men? Do men give larger tips to women with larger breasts?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 140
programme.desc: Can you mail a coconut without packaging? Can you make a candle out of earwax? Can you make someone urinate involuntarily by putting their hand in a bowl of warm water while they sleep?

programme.title: Mythbusters

channel.desc: From true-crime factual series to binge-worthy procedurals, this channel will bring together everything that makes crime so fascinating to viewers.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A daring kidnapping and a bizarre ransom note baffled Mississippi authorities. The victim was the wife of a wealthy businessman. A list of 12 names and a few drops of blood were the only clues to her fate.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Crime Spree
programme.desc: They swept through six states like a plague, thrill killers acting without rhyme or reason. They targeted adults and young girls, kidnapping, and murdering. And in their rampage, they left plenty of clues, but moving targets are the hardest to hit.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Lost Boys
programme.desc: In June of 1997, a crime wave swept Iowa like a tornado. It left a trail of robbery, kidnapping, and murder in its wake, and then it moved on. No one knew where.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Brutal Abduction
programme.desc: A Chicago street gang thought they had figured out how to kidnap people for ransom again and again, and never get caught. But their one mistake was they underestimated the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Shattered Shield
programme.desc: In a city awash in narcotics the drug lords have all the power even over the police. Corruption in New Orleans grew like cancer, eating away at public safety and threatening to destroy the city. Crooked cops break the laws they were sworn to uphold.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Without Remorse
programme.desc: A small town without any crime was turned inside out by the arrival of one dangerous stranger. Some killers are cold and calculating; others are impulsive, unpredictable, and hard to pin down.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Millionaire Murder
programme.desc: A businessman went to Florida to make one last deal before he retired-he never returned home to his millions. Authorities examined who was closest to him and who stood to gain from his disappearance. But this time conventional rules didn't apply.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Melissa Brannen: Missing
programme.desc: In 1989, residents of a close-knit apartment community in Virginia gathered for a holiday celebration. For Tammy Brannen and five-year-old daughter Melissa, Christmas was always a special time. Then, without warning, the little girl was gone.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Heist
programme.desc: In Arizona, an armored van loaded with cash failed to reach its destination. Authorities suspected an inside job. When the vehicle was recovered with the drivers and the cash missing, those suspicions grew even more.

programme.title: The FBI Files: A Stranger in Town
programme.desc: She appeared on the highway in the spring, a young woman, her life cut short, her past and her identity a mystery. Only by finding out who she was could we ever hope to find her killer.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Mission
programme.desc: When a family was murdered in Arkansas, it seemed like an isolated event. But soon the crime was revealed to be part of an ever-widening circle of violence that defined a new age of domestic terrorism.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Killing Zone
programme.desc: In the 1990's the war on drugs was in full swing. The front lines were often America's inner cities where gangs use violence and murder to rule their empires.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The World Trade Center Bombing
programme.desc: Terrorist bombings are what happen in other countries. Not here in the United States. And yet, in 1993, it happened in New York City.

programme.title: Pluto TV Crime+
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Imagine a world where your greatest fears become reality. In each pulse-racing "Fear Factor" episode, recruited contestants battle in extreme stunts. These stunts are designed to challenge the contestants both physically and mentally.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Boat Helicopter Truck Car Jump,Bullfrog Coffin
programme.sub-title: Boat Helicopter Truck Car Jump,Bullfrog Coffin
programme.desc: Both contestants in the finals will ride on the back of an Ultraboat as a helicopter settles in overhead. The male contestant will be placed in a bamboo cage filled with large bullfrogs, which is then lowered into a pit.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Helicopter Rope Transfer,Tumbler Cage,Gross Obstacle Course,Up & Over Car Ramp
programme.sub-title: Helicopter Rope Transfer,Tumbler Cage,Gross Obstacle Course,Up & Over Car Ramp
programme.desc: A rope will be suspended between two helicopters. Contestants will be standing in a tall cage. Contestants must discover a key to a box of worms', which will be transferred onto a scale.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Submerged Car Rotisserie, Fear Factor Sushi Bar, Wall Sweeper
programme.sub-title: Submerged Car Rotisserie, Fear Factor Sushi Bar, Wall Sweeper
programme.desc: Contestant is locked by their waist to the drivers seat and wrist to the steering wheel. Contestants determine the quantity and variety of Fear Factor Sushi they will have to eat. A six-inch wide beam will be sticking out perpendicular from a roof top.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Helicopter Dual Drop, Yo Yo Tank, Cattle Trench, Semi To Tanker Truck
programme.sub-title: Helicopter Dual Drop, Yo Yo Tank, Cattle Trench, Semi To Tanker Truck
programme.desc: Contestants will be seated in a helicopter and hang directly under the skids. One of the partners will be dangling by their ankle.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Houdini Hang w/ Car Slide & Pyro, Fear Factor Cocktail Bar, Rope Traverse and Toss
programme.sub-title: Houdini Hang w/ Car Slide & Pyro, Fear Factor Cocktail Bar, Rope Traverse and Toss
programme.desc: Fear Factor goes to Vegas! One stunt begins with a contestant hanging in mid-air with their wrists and ankles bound. In another stunt, contestants consume sickening cocktails.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Dual Blade Wall & Heli Rope Climb, Fear Factor Wedding Toast, Couples Car Into Lagoon
programme.sub-title: Dual Blade Wall & Heli Rope Climb, Fear Factor Wedding Toast, Couples Car Into Lagoon
programme.desc: Contestants will be standing on the bottom ledge of plexi-glass wall that is suspended over the water from a crane. Newlywed couples will have to tear apart a Fear Factor wedding cake filled with insects.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Water Beam, Triple Dump Tunnel, Heli Cargo Net Box
programme.sub-title: Water Beam, Triple Dump Tunnel, Heli Cargo Net Box
programme.desc: Contestants will stand on a beam above the water where they must make their way around a structure. Contestants will also climb through a plexi-glass tunnel.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Shower Beam, Sausage Fest, Dual pipe Ramp
programme.sub-title: Shower Beam, Sausage Fest, Dual pipe Ramp
programme.desc: Contestants must devour covered trays concealing six different types of horrifying Fear Factor Sausage. Team members will also be seated in separate stunt cars on opposite ends of a track for a thrilling game.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Heli Repel, Meat Locker, Mud Trough
programme.sub-title: Heli Repel, Meat Locker, Mud Trough
programme.desc: Contestants will be standing on opposite skids of the same helicopter. Contestants are hog tied with duct tape on the floor of a meat locker.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Sikorsky Cargo Net, Tunnel Escape, Armored Car With Water
programme.sub-title: Sikorsky Cargo Net, Tunnel Escape, Armored Car With Water
programme.desc: Million dollar heist episode! Contestants will be locked to a net that is dangling from the cargo ramp of a Sikorsky helicopter over water. Contestants must also make their way through a maze and climb into a car slowly filling with water.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Flying Boat Flag Snag, Crab Dump Escape, Dual ice Box
programme.sub-title: Flying Boat Flag Snag, Crab Dump Escape, Dual ice Box
programme.desc: Two contestants will be driving a boat down a path while connected to a helicopter. Contestants will also kneel in a plexi glass tank and stand in a plexi box that is suspended over water in this special blind date-themed episode!

programme.title: Fear Factor: Crane Cannon Launch, Trash Can Scavenger Hunt, Heli Body Drag
programme.sub-title: Crane Cannon Launch, Trash Can Scavenger Hunt, Heli Body Drag
programme.desc: Contestants will jump into garbage, retrieving items to win in one disgusting stunt. Later, 2 contestants will hold onto ski lines connected to a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor: Buried Alive, Rat & Snake Water Escape
programme.sub-title: Buried Alive, Rat & Snake Water Escape
programme.desc: A contestant is placed in a coffin, lowered into a grave, and their partner must free them. The contestants will be placed into a 7-foot deep Plexiglas tank divided into two sections and filled with water in this episode, part 1 of a Psycho-theme special!

channel.desc: Ice Pilots is about an eccentric airline and its motley crew that fly vintage planes on impossible arctic missions. Buffalo Airways attracts young pilots seeking Arctic adventure and the chance to fly big, old, piston powered aircrafts from a bygone era.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Buffalo Scores
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when they're asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North. Cup fever spreads quickly around Buffalo, and for Mikey, what begins as an innocent love for this hockey icon soon becomes an obsession.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Chief Pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge. Electra expert Chuck goes one-on-one with a stubborn power unit, and Rod's wife Sasha goes into labour with the newest member of the McBryan family.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Yukon
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination. Patient C-46 co-pilot Scott Blue finally gets his crack at the DC-4.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: British Invasion
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head off to Coventry, England to navigate the potential purchase of an Electra turboprop to add to Buffalo's fleet of fire-fighting tanker planes. The father-son duo makes a great team.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Arnie Calls It
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision. AJ becomes a DC-4 captain and ponders whether to accept a promotion.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Under New Management
programme.desc: Joe hires outsider Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey. Gord and Sean's DC-3 delivery mission to the High Arctic goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Dambusters
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid. A routine C-46 flight becomes dangerous when a hole in the plane's aging exhaust system sets off the fire alarm.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Chuck Walks
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits. Joe clashes with the maintenance department when a series of delays puts the sale of an old Canso waterbomber in jeopardy.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Gear Up, Gear Down
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over. Devan, Ian and Jimmy deal with a hydraulic fluid leak in the C-46 on the valley run.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Big Boost
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage, Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul. Cory leads a rescue mission to retrieve an abandoned C-46 and Mikey escapes to Ottawa for a birthday joyride in a fighter jet.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Power Struggle
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck. Kelly plans her Mexican wedding, but Jynelle's sudden resignation leaves her in the lurch.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Top of the World
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and Duane to work things out. Hay River rampie Tyler is on the fast track to a co-pilot seat, but first has to prove his flying ability to Buffalo's new chief pilot, Justin.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Last Days
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes. Larry, a rookie rampie, makes a near fatal error while training on the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts. But his over- zealous efforts result in a clash with the crew and with Joe, and a down-to-the-wire midnight departure to meet a deadline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots: The Doghouse
programme.desc: Duane's decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract. Young DC-3 co-pilot Graeme sees his chance to move up to a bigger plane disappear when he falls out of favour with Joe.

programme.title: Ice Pilots
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Welcome to Anime All Day. A full channel dedicated to complex narratives and eye-popping animation. Catch up on your favorite series or jump into something entirely new, Anime All Day will have some for you.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Rook Takes Knight
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Crow of Team 5D's looks to give Herman's Hook the Hidden Knight the heave-ho before it ruins his Runner and catapults Team Catastrophe into the next round.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part I
programme.desc: Primo and his Duel Bot Army crash the World Racing Grand Prix, putting the tournament and New Domino City in jeopardy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part II
programme.desc: Primo decides to take matters into his own hands by challenging Yusei Fudo to a duel after watching Yusei interfere with his Duel Bot Army's mission of mechanized mayhem.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part III
programme.desc: Hoping to stop New Domino City from spiraling into total chaos, Yusei takes on Primo and his Meklord Emperors' debilitating ability to absorb Synchro Monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part IV
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance and Primo in control of Stardust Dragon, Yusei must figure out a way to get his go-to card back before his life points hit zero.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Primos Plan: Part V
programme.desc: It's the climactic conclusion to the battle between Yusei and Primo! Can Yusei defeat this menace and save his City, or will Primo prevail and send New Domino spiraling into chaos?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Eyes on the Prize
programme.desc: Yusei and Team 5D's get set to take on Team Ragnarok and their powerful Nordic Gods  Thor, Loki and Odin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Duel for Redemption
programme.desc: When Jack is informed by Team Ragnarok's Dragan that Director Goodwin fixed the match they had years earlier, Jack begins to doubt his Turbo Dueling talents. Can Jack kick things into overdrive?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Soul Solutions
programme.desc: Determined to defeat Dragan and his Nordic God, Jack summons a mighty new monster to the field that has enough fire power to send all of Dragan's life points up in smoke!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: When Nordic Gods Attack
programme.desc: With only a handful of life points remaining and the Nordic God, Thor, staring down at him, Jack gets set to take on his next opponent - Team Ragnarok's Broder!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Tricking the Trickster
programme.desc: After swooping in take on Team Ragnarok's Broder, Crow finds himself battling two Nordic Gods  Thor and Loki! Can Crow defeat these two dynamos, or will this dynamic duo prove to be too much for Crow and his battle-tested Blackwings?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Yusei's Last Stand
programme.desc: With the tournament on the line, Yusei must find a way to defeat Halldor before the three Nordic Gods knock his life points down to nothing!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fight to the Finish Line
programme.desc: It's the exciting conclusion to the semifinal battle between Team Ragnarok and Team 5D's! Can Yusei Fudo muster a miracle comeback against Team Ragnarok's Halldor?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Beginning of the End
programme.desc: The grand finale of the World Racing Grand Prix is set to start, and our two finalists -Team 5D's and Team New World - are ready to take center stage. For Yusei, Jack and Crow, second place isn't an option!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Dawn of the Machines
programme.desc: It's one down and two to go for Team 5D's as Jack and his mighty Red Nova Dragon get set to take on and take out Primo and Jakob of Team New World!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Against All Odds
programme.desc: With Jack out of commission, all eyes turn to Crow as he swoops in to duel Jakob! Does Crow have what it takes to take down Team New World's best duelist, or will Crow suffer the same cruel fate that sent his teammate crashing into defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: For Synchro's Sake
programme.desc: With the safety of New Domino City hanging in the balance, Yusei Fudo from Team 5D's looks to rev it up against Team New World's Jakob in the final round of the World Racing Grand Prix!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Fight for the Future
programme.desc: After witnessing Jakob, Primo and Lester fuse together to form the all-powerful Aporia, Yusei must now figure out a way to defeat this formidable foe before he destroys New Domino City!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: Victory or Doom
programme.desc: In the exciting conclusion to the World Racing Grand Prix, Yusei Fudo, facing his toughest opponent ever, must rev it up one last time if he hopes to defeat Aporia and save New Domino City from being destroyed!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Link into the VRAINS
programme.desc: When a nefarious group of hackers threatens to destroy the cyber world, one duelist is determined to stop them – Playmaker!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Seize the Wind!
programme.desc: The Knights of Hanoi have set their sights on stealing Playmaker’s AI – but he won’t give it up without a fight!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Contact
programme.desc: Yusaku’s AI holds countless secrets, and Yusaku is determined to uncover every one!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Pain and Gain
programme.desc: The Gore - LINK VRAINS’ biggest and boldest bruiser - is looking to pin Playmaker for the three count!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Down for the Count
programme.desc: Gore’s looking to suplex Playmaker into submission, but Playmaker’s not about to tap out!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: True Blue
programme.desc: Blue Angel hopes to give her fans something to scream about by defeating Playmaker, but after receiving a dangerous card from the Knights of Hanoi, her fans might be screaming for all the wrong reasons!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Fallen Angel
programme.desc: Playmaker’s battle takes a dark and dangerous turn when a malicious virus infects Blue Angel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: A Storm is Coming
programme.desc: To cure Blue Angel, Playmaker must put Ai on the line.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Malicious Mayhem
programme.desc: Playmaker takes on Varis and learns there’s more to Ai than meets the eye!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Varis and Playmaker raise the stakes when they put the brakes on their Speed Duel and battle it out in Master Duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS: Neutralized
programme.desc: Varis’ relentless onslaught continues as he pummels Playmaker into digital dust!

channel.desc: We open the vaults to yesteryears most memorable and entertaining cartoons. From Spinach popping Popeye, to space travelling heroes in Defenders of the Earth, this channel will bring generations together to share in the excitement of all things animated!

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Moon of Mystery
programme.desc: Flash and Aura form an uneasy alliance to protect the peaceful inhabitants of a previously undiscovered moon from Ming's wrath.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Revenge of the Dragon!
programme.desc: Sulpha finds a cache of what seem to be dragon eggs, and asks Flash to stall Ming while she searches for the secret to her lost race.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Fiendish Experiment!
programme.desc: Zarkov literally loses his mind in a dangerous Dynacrystal experiment, enabling Ming to lure Flash and Dale into a deadly trap.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Dungeons of Despair!
programme.desc: Ming throws Lynch in jail, but his replacement performs so well that Flash, Aura and Barin trick Ming getting Lynch back.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Treasure of the Depths!
programme.desc: Talon discovers Ming's powerful energy source, a priceless hoard of Dynacrystals hidden deep in a mountain lake.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Fortress of Fear!
programme.desc: Ming prepares to attack King Vultan of the Hawk People. It's up to Flash and Talon to keep Hawk City from being blown from the sky.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye The Carpenter
programme.desc: Olive Oyl wants a picture hung on a wall in her house, so she calls in Popeye and Bluto to do this. However, Popeye and Bluto fight so much between themselves they end up wrecking Olive's house.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: The Ski's The Limit
programme.desc: Olive Oyl is teaching Swee'Pea how to skate. Popeye tried to learn also, but falls. Meanwhile Swee'Pea is in danger and Olive tries to rescue him but in vain. Popeye goes to their rescue and saves them both.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye The Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Popeye has spent seven days and sleepless nights on the high seas. When he returns he wants to call Olive Oyl but he falls asleep, and starts to sleep-walk onto the roof of the boat.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: A Whale of a Tale
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews can't sleep so he tells them a story about a man who was swallowed by a whale and who rescues a mermaid (Olive) from marrying King Neptune.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye Goes Sailing
programme.desc: Bluto invites Olive to go sailing with him, but because Popeye also wants to go along Bluto destroys his boat and sinks Popeye with it.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: A Seal with Appeal
programme.desc: Popeye and his nephews go fishing in his boat and they find a seal that they want to keep as a pet.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Wilder than Usual Blue Yonder
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive for a ride in his home made airplane but she doesn't like it.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye Out West
programme.desc: Olive is performing for an audience that doesn't like her show. As the audience starts to make more and more noise, Popeye becomes very angry and challenges them to a show-down at sun-down.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Heir-Brained Popeye
programme.desc: After going to a great deal of trouble to read the will that Popeye's unknown uncle left him, Popeye finds out that what he has been left isn't money but debts.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye & Bigfoot
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive go camping and meet Big Foot who happens to be Bluto in disguise.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Close Encounters of the Third Spinach
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of the Third Spinach
programme.desc: In this space-age scenario, Popeye rescues Princess Olivepit from Dark Bluto with the aid of an old man who turns out to be Popeye's long lost father.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye's Finest Hour
programme.desc: Popeye is mistakenly called up to serve in the Navy. While at Boot Camp, Popeye meets young Bluto, newphew of the Bluto who is his arch enemy.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Ship Ahoy
programme.desc: Popeye takes his nephews to the high seas to teach them about sailing a boat. Bluto has other ideas and tries to ruin their day, only to learn a lesson of his own, thanks to Popeye and his little heros.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Here Stew You
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked on an island. Popeye goes off to explore while Olive cooks some stew for dinner.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye's Roots
programme.desc: Grandpa Poopdeck gives Popeye's nephews valuable lessons about learning their roots.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Popeye Snags the Seahag
programme.desc: Private-Eve Popeye gets a call from a ship owner who tells him that the Seahag alias Madam No-No has "ship-napped" a whole fleet of ships.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: The Decathalon Dilemma
programme.desc: Popeye goes out to a field to practice for a decathlon. Pappy wants to go along also, but Popeye tells him to stay home because his is too old and might get hurt.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Chips Off the Old Ice Block
programme.sub-title: Chips Off the Old Ice Block
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto get into an argument over who will teach Swee'Pea to skate.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Shark Treatment
programme.desc: Popeye and Poopdeck Pappy go out to sea and they run across one of Poopdeck's old enemies from forty years back -- Monster Maki, the great white shark.

programme.title: Popeye: New Adventures: Mother Goose on the Loose
programme.desc: Popeye plans to tell his nephews some stories when Bluto interferes and wants to tell his own. Naturally, this leads to a disagreement form which Popeye emerges victorious.

programme.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries: Attack of the Killer Spuds
programme.desc: An alien invasion turns Riverdale teenagers into zonedout couch potatoes, while sentient space potatoes mutate to replace them as vegetable zombies.

programme.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries: Me Me Me!
programme.desc: Reluctantly preparing donations to the local museum for her father, whiny and selfcentered Veronica gets a taste of her own medicine when she wishes that everyone be like me.

programme.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries: Driven to Distraction
programme.desc: Archie buys a pair of mystical fuzzy dice for his beloved car, Betsy, and unwittingly brings her to life when he hangs the dice on her rearview mirror.

channel.desc: Today in a world of uncertainty, our health now is never more so important. On Pluto TV Health, we bring you a selection of documentaries and series highlighting the importance of our health.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: We’re revisiting Louise Sapsford, boredom binger Tracy Morgan and too lazy to eat Alex Law and finding out 3 years down the line if their time in the feeding clinic did anything to change their disastrous diets.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: On tonight’s emotional show we revisit 4 people from last series who were in the grip of the life threatening eating disorder, anorexia.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: At just 6 stone 10lbs, 19 year old Tatiana Moxfis extremely underweight and desperate for people to stop asking her if she's got an eating disorder

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Fussy freaky eaters put up a food fight in the feeding clinic as Superskinny Yasmin Smith is forced to swallow a gargantuan diet of snack foods and diet drinks.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: It's the mother of all food fights in the feeding clinic as Superskinny carb-phobic Amy Jo Saunders faces up to snackaholic man mountain, thirty eight and a half stoner Andy Duckworth

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Tipping the scales just over 6 stones, 41-year-old Elizabeth Young thinks she's found the elixer to eternal youth-starving herself.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Since leaving home 26 year old Kevin Calladine hasn't had a decent meal. Short on time and money his weight has plummeted to just 8 stone 7lbs and he's two stones underweight.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: In the feeding clinic this week, two women at opposite ends of the weight spectrum but with one thing in common, they both want to look wonderful in their wedding dresses

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Dr Christian Jessen faces a bumpy ride this week in the feeding clinic as superskinny size zero Louise Sapsford, who clocks in at 6 stone 2lb, faces up to supersize 28 stone 13 pounder Desroy Gordon's challenging diet of non-stop take-aways.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Long and lanky, 22-year-old Alex Law from Stockport hits the scales at just over ten stone because he barely eats a meal. Tired and exhausted he lives on a diet of caffeine pills supplemented.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 39 year old Tracey from Tonbridge in Kent spent 22 years trying to get pregnant and the emotional anxiety led to her weight ballooning to over 18 stone.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 41 year old Trudy from Bedfordshire runs her own business and is a mum of three. Kim is a fitness fanatic who runs 45 miles a week but eats like a sparrow.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Phillipa is a 48 year old ‘foodie’ from Sheffield who just can’t say no. Gillian is a 24 year old student nurse from Inverness and single mum of two.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 37-year-old Martin works on the night shift as a Fire Engineer for London Underground. Christine is a 21 year old student who lives at home in Manchester with her mum and younger sister.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: 27 year old Marketing Consultant Ameer is looking for love and has never been in a relationship. 18 year old Georgetta has been modelling and dancing since she was a baby.

channel.desc: The stories that warm your heart, the moments that make an impact, and the films that bring a tear to your eye all live on Pluto TV Drama. From real-life struggles to emotional award winners, you'll find something to love 24 hours a day.

programme.title: Renegade: Den of Thieves
programme.desc: Reno helps his former partner escape a murder plot only to get into further danger when they become entangled with drug dealers.

programme.title: Renegade: Rancho Escondido
programme.desc: Reno helps Bobby find a banker who stole Bobby's money and becomes the unwitting victim of a plastic surgeon's dangerous scheme.

programme.title: Renegade: Cop for a Day
programme.desc: Reno and Bobby pursue an escaped bank robber who, suffering from multiple personalities, assumes the identity of a cop.

programme.title: Renegade: Stalker's Moon
programme.desc: Bobby is about to become a serial killer's next victim unless Reno and Cheyenne can save him, but the police consider Reno the most likely suspect.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno goes undercover as a repossession agent in order to apprehend an unstable gunmen who is shooting other agents.

programme.title: Renegade: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: When a real estate agent is killed, Reno must protect the man's wife and son from a gunman who had illegal business dealings with the agent.

programme.title: Renegade: Living Legend
programme.desc: Reno is in trouble when Bobby's teacher and mentor, a legendary bounty hunter, targets Reno as his next prey

programme.title: Renegade: Family Ties
programme.desc: Reno's patience is tested when he must protect a wealthy socialite who witnessed a murder but doesn't believe that she is the killer's next intended victim.

programme.title: Renegade: Broken on the Wheel of Love
programme.sub-title: Broken on the Wheel of Love
programme.desc: Country singer Jessie Rae Anders captures Reno's heart while he tries to capture her assailant.

programme.title: Renegade: Split Decision
programme.desc: Reno leaves Sixkiller Enterprises after he causes Cheyenne to be injured, but he's got even more to worry about when Dixon discovers his whereabouts.

programme.title: Renegade: Hitman
programme.desc: Reno makes a difficult decision when a wealthy dying hit man offers to clear Reno's reputation — in exchange for a big favor.

programme.title: Renegade: Sawed-Off Shotgun Wedding
programme.desc: Reno falls in love with the legal representative for a foreign ambassador who is running a lucrative drug smuggling operation and hides behind the cover of diplomatic immunity.

programme.title: Renegade: Honeymoon in Mexico
programme.desc: When Bobby and Reno take a much needed vacation to Mexico, the two agree not to discuss any business on the trip but that pact is short-lived.

programme.title: Renegade: The Ballad of D.B. Cooper
programme.desc: After winning a poker game, Bobby gets a hot tip on a legendary fugitive. He tracks the man to a small remote village and finds the whole town has been keeping the man's identity a secret.

programme.title: Renegade: Most Wanted
programme.desc: Cheyenne places a "most eligible bachelor" personals ad for Bobby in a magazine and they get flooded with responses.

channel.desc: This British daytime TV institution is now in it 22nd season on BBC1 and show's no sign of losing any of it's curb appeal.Wannabe property developers chance their arm in the auction room buying properties to let.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a two-bedroom house in Surrey, a flat in London and a bungalow in Derby.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit properties in Middlesex, Kent and Manchester.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 3
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander and Martin Roberts see a modern property in the historic village of Lacock in Wiltshire; an ex-local authority terraced house in South Wales; and a three bedroom, end-of-terrace house in Bulwell, in the suburbs of Nottingham.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 17
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Dorset that may not look too promising, a house in Hertfordshire and in Derbyshire all is not quiet as it seems.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 10
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin see a two bedroom, mid terrace in Fenton, Stoke on Trent; in Earlsfield, South London there's a ground floor, garden flat in need of some serious redecoration work; and a mid terrace, two bedroom house in Folkestone on the Kent coast.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 3
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a grand farm house worth getting excited about in Cheshire, in Dorset there's an old wooden chapel praying for help from above and in Stoke there's a spacious semi with no space.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Surrey and New Castle.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 13
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Cardiff that seems to tick all the boxes – well almost, Lucy takes a trip to Kent for some food for thought, and Martin finds a place that sweeps him off his feet in Liverpool!

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a terraced house in Burton-on-Trent, a flat in Wimbledon and a detached house in Stockton-on-Tees.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 26
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin travel to Wiltshire to see a character cottage. It's on to Dorset to see a plot of land with an old builders store on it, and in Dartford, Kent there's a two bed terrace house close to good transport links.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Liverpool, London and Wiltshire.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view properties in Reading, Nottingham and Kent
