channel.desc: Focus on the great television series that came out of the 70s, 80s, and 90s. Shows got bigger--bigger stories, bigger action, and bigger entertainment. These are the shows that ushered in a new era of TV.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: Just Another Three-Ring Circus
programme.desc: Ralph becomes a human cannonball to investigate the disappearance of a Polish clown.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: The Shock Will Kill You
programme.desc: While rescuing a stricken space shuttle, Ralph becomes hyper-magnetized and sticks to all things metal. Meanwhile, a strange creature aboard the shuttle heads towards Los Angeles, electrocuting all who get in its way.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: A Chicken in Every Plot
programme.desc: Ralph, Pam and Bill find out how the suit will do against voodoo when they find themselves pitted against the evil president of a small island country in the West Indies.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
programme.sub-title: The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Ralph and Bill hunt for the sea creature "Carrie" in the Bermuda Triangle, thinking that the monster may be responsible for all of the boats that disappear there.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: It's All Downhill from Here
programme.desc: Hinkley and Pam's Squaw Valley vacation turns serious when they call Bill to help a Czechoslovakian downhill racer and his girlfriend defect with secret information.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: Dreams
programme.desc: When Ralph uses the suit to help his associates realize their dreams, it complicates all of their lives.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: There's Just No Accounting
programme.desc: Ralph's suit proves no match for the IRS when a satchel of money from a kidnapping turns up in Ralph's living room.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: The Good Samaritan
programme.desc: Ralph's good deeds are complicated when two convicts escape and Bill thinks he's the target.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: Captain Bellybuster and the Speed Factory
programme.sub-title: Captain Bellybuster and the Speed Factory
programme.desc: When a man who plays a superhero for a hamburger chain discovers that the stores are a front for drug dealers, he calls on Ralph for help.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: Who's Woo in America
programme.desc: Ralph's Mom is going to marry a con man who is smuggling a micro-chip that corrupt oilmen have killed for.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: Lilacs, Mr. Maxwell
programme.desc: Ralph breaks into the FBI archives and helps Bill solve a number of cold cases. As a result, Bill becomes a hero and a target for a beautiful KGB assassin.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: Divorce, Venusian Style
programme.desc: Ralph is critically wounded when he rescues Maxwell from a gang of neo-Nazis.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: The Price is Right
programme.desc: At a high school reunion, Ralph is reunited with an old friend who is now a famous quarterback.

programme.title: The Greatest American Hero: This Is the One the Suit Was Meant For
programme.sub-title: This Is the One the Suit Was Meant For
programme.desc: Pam is ready to break up with Ralph because of the suit. To keep them together, Bill sends them to a tropical island. But they discover Bill's real plan: to use the suit to find a missing aircraft.

programme.title: Pluto TV Retro Drama+
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: From the “so bad it’s good” to the “so weird it’s great,” Pluto TV Cult Films is like having your own personal drive-in movie theater playing the wildest, funniest, and most-beloved cult classics ever made.

programme.title: Mighty Crusaders
programme.desc: Godeffroy leads a crusade to conquer Jerusalem, with the Pope's blessing. The siege to the Saracen city and the massive battle will decide who will prevail in the region - but feminine charms and spy rings are very important for the end game.

programme.title: Castle of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A troupe of travelling players are invited by Count Drago to perform at his castle. Ignoring the warning given by a local mystic, they accept - and begin to die, horrifically, one by one!

programme.title: The House That Dripped Blood
programme.desc: Robert Bloch, the author of Psycho, presents a quartet of terrifying tales. (1971)

programme.title: The Hunchback Of Notre Dame
programme.desc: In 15th-century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

programme.title: Munchie
programme.desc: The ever hungry and funny Munchie is back in this sequel to "Munchies". Starring: Loni Anderson, Andrew Stevens, Jamie McEnnan, Jennifer Love Hewitt

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes
programme.desc: A group of scientists band together to save the world from mutated tomatoes that KILL! (1978)

channel.desc: Food glorious food, 24 hours of a day. This stand and stir marathon never ceases to amaze with all of your Gusto favourites including Spenser, the One World Kitchen team and new to Pluto TV Chef Michael Bonacini.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Salmon and Strawberries
programme.desc: Chef Lauren Gulyas exercises her creativity with salmon cakes, strawberries and biscuits, and a mind-blowing final strawberry and salmon combo dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Prawns and Pistachios
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell gets creative to meet the “P” challenge posed by prawns and pistachios with prosciutto-wrapped prawns and pistachio brittle.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Duck and Dates
programme.desc: Watch Chef Leah Wildman as she faces the challenge posed by duck and dates. She makes dishes with each, then combines them for a delicious surprise.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Campania
programme.desc: The Italian region Campania is known for its seafood and pizza. Famed Chef Michael Bonacini prepares classics like Margherita Pizza and Fried Seafood.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Sicily
programme.desc: Rice Balls stuffed with Seafood and Pistachio Cannoli are on the menu as Chef Michael Bonacini explores dishes from the Italian island of Sicily.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Piemonte
programme.desc: Piemonte cuisine is influenced by its mountainous terrain. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us how to make its warm regional dishes like Bagna Cauda.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Lombardy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini prepares traditional dishes from the Northern Italian region, Lombardy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Veneto
programme.desc: Home to popular Italian dishes like Tiramisu, Chef Michael Bonacini explores cuisine from Italy's Veneto region.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Lazio
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini cooks up classic dishes like Mint Fava Bean Soup and Amaretti Cake from the well-known Lazio region of Italy.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy: Umbria
programme.desc: Charming host Michael Bonacini inspires us to make simple, flavourful dishes from the rustic Italian region, Umbria.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: A Lot on Your Plate
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen serves up delicious meals for a busy lifestyle from a mouth-watering breakfast burrito to a no-carb cauliflower pizza.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: Low Carbs, No Problems
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen shows us low-carb options for any meal of the day. Buckwheat pancakes smothered in blueberries? Yes, please!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: Go Green
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen shows us how to add more plants to your plate with a chocolate avocado smoothie, nori rolls, and sweet potato noodles.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: Quick Eats
programme.desc: Host Desiree Nielsen spiralizes zucchini into “zoodles” to create a balanced, veggie-packed pad thai dish.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: Energy Boost
programme.desc: Food nerd Desiree Nielsen masters a perfectly cooked eggplant topped with a flavourful charmoula and couscous.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: Veggies Galore
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen shows how beets can make the icing on a delectable cupcake vibrant and delicious.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian: Fun and Simple
programme.desc: Foodie Desiree Nielsen gives life to spotty bananas, transforming it into melt-in-your-mouth bread.

programme.title: Flour Power: Italian Sweets
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern bakes up some delightful Italian classics including a crumbly Cherry-pistachio Biscotti.

programme.title: Flour Power: Fancy French Flavours
programme.desc: Talented baker Jessica McGovern shows us how to get fancy with three stunning French desserts.

programme.title: Flour Power: Eat your Fruits and Veggies
programme.desc: Don’t forget to eat your fruits and veggies! Host Jessica McGovern shows us how to include nutritious ingredients into our decadent desserts.

programme.title: Flour Power: Chewy, Chocolately
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern gives us a sweet taste of chocolate heaven with an overload of chocolatey desserts including a decadent Bombe au Chocolat.

programme.title: Flour Power: Tea Party Treats
programme.desc: High tea requires royal desserts! Host Jessica McGovern gives us the lowdown on some sophisticated sweets to pair with a warm cup of tea.

programme.title: Flour Power: Impress Your Kids
programme.desc: Talented host Jessica McGovern shows us how to impress both kids and adults with three over-the-top desserts including a magical Geode Cake.

programme.title: Flour Power: Magic in the Middle
programme.desc: Host Jessica McGovern gives us a little surprise on the inside by baking up tasty filled goodies including White Chocolate Lava Cake.

programme.title: Flour Power: Pretty Shower Goodies
programme.desc: Make hosting your next shower a cinch with Jessica McGovern’s simple and super cute recipes - like tiny Oatmeal Cookie Cheesecake Cups!

programme.title: Crate to Plate: Cranberries
programme.desc: Millions of pounds of cranberries start their global journey from a Nova Scotia farm. Watch one batch make their way from field to Thanksgiving feast.

programme.title: Crate to Plate: Spot Prawns
programme.desc: From the cool clear blue waters of Vancouver to a beachside grill, watch the harrowing journey of a highly sought-after spot prawn.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Fish Night
programme.desc: Kids don’t always love fish – host Spencer Watts shares some simple, inexpensive, and tasty recipes that will change your kids’ opinion of fish night.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Chicken Bake Night
programme.desc: Spencer Watts cooks up a nutritious meal for four featuring Crispy Lemon Chicken, Sweet Potato Rosti, and Baked Peaches.

channel.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Hunter: The Beautiful & the Dead: Part 1
programme.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Hunter: The Beautiful & the Dead: Part 2
programme.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Hunter: The Return of Typhoon Thompson
programme.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Hunter: Saturday Night Special
programme.desc: When Rick Hunter, a renegade cop who takes justice into his own hands, partners with the stunning and rebellious Sgt. McCall, they set out to crack down on L.A.'s slimiest criminals.

programme.title: Hunter: Overnight Sensation
programme.desc: Hunter attempts to apprehend a vicious robbery suspect while he clashes with a vindictive reporter bent on destroying the detective's career.

programme.title: Hunter: Change Partners and Dance
programme.desc: Detectives Hunter and McCall must work individually to investigate the killing of a police officer after they are separated as partners by their new precinct leader.

programme.title: Hunter: Crime of Passion
programme.desc: McCall belives that a man accused of murdering his wife is innocent.

programme.title: Hunter: The Castro Connection
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall attempt to break a cocaine syndicate apparently being run by one of Hunter's most trusted ex-partners.

programme.title: Hunter: High Noon in L.A.
programme.desc: Hunter receives a death threat from a quick-tempered foreign official determined to avenge his brother's death.

programme.title: Hunter: From San Francisco with Love
programme.desc: A beautiful San Francisco police detective aids Hunter and McCall in solving a series of puzzling murders apparently connected to the estate of a deceased millionaire.

programme.title: Hunter: True Confessions
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall search for a vengeful woman suspected of murdering two men involved in her sister's cocaine-related death.

programme.title: Hunter: Love, Hate and Shorty James
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall try to protect their informant, Sporty James, from his own greed after he blackmails a ruthless cocaine dealer who's responsible for a murder.

programme.title: Hunter: The Contract
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall's kidnapping-homicide investigation is thwarted by a rich industrialist who wants to control their methods of rescuing his abducted wife.

programme.title: Hunter: The Cradle Will Rock
programme.desc: McCall masquerades as a nightclub singer to investigate the disappearance of a rock music star.

channel.desc: Why do women kill? Deadly Women investigates true crime stories & reveals the horrific murders these women commit & the psyche behind their cold-blooded crimes, through revenge, fatal affairs, greed or just pure rage.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Obsession
programme.desc: Deciphering what causes minds to corkscrew out of control is the complex work of the criminal profiler. Obsessions can take many forms: beauty, devotion, ego and power.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: In some cases, the transformation from everyday woman to brutal killer is activated by a man. A boyfriend or husband can become the focus of a deadly obsession.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: These women would stop at nothing to get their hands on the cash they needed. From husbands to strangers to other people’s babies, they spilt blood for money.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Nurse Beverley Allitt overdosed multiple infants, Stella Nickell poisoned medicine capsules in stores and Kathleen Follbigg killed four of her own children.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Sometimes, when a man and a woman unite, a terrible urge for destruction can awaken in them both. Happy couples become deadly teams, intent on one goal: murder.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Greed
programme.desc: Known as “black widows,” these women kill their spouses, lovers and children for profit. Murder for them becomes a business. Their trade is murder. Their profit? Blood money.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: We want to believe that all women would give their lives to protect their children. But there are horrifying cases when a mother will turn against her natural instinct and kill her own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: A lovely lady with an innocent smile, kind eyes, a charming personality? No one would suspect a woman like that would murder. These women don’t look or behave like killers.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: Behind their friendly smiles, deadly women hide histories of bloodshed and murder.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Women who kill husbands, lovers, rivals and parents will shock society. But a very special horror is reserved for women who will kill their own.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Teen Killers
programme.desc: They were too young to drink or vote but they were not too young to commit the most brutal of crimes. Some were driven by pure curiosity: how would it feel to take a life?

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: Blood ties are strong ties, sometimes strong enough to pull a person into a murderous conspiracy. When a family member wields his or her power, the result can be death.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Love Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Love can be beautiful, love can be blind and love can be deadly. Desire and jealousy are powerful forces driving women to dark and horrifying places in their minds.

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: No one doubts a woman’s capacity to love, but sometimes lust can turn lethal. In the ultimate fatal attraction, "Deadly Women" looks at cases of murder driven by obsessive love.

programme.title: Deadly Women

channel.desc: Produced with the full cooperation of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. Through dramatic reenactments and interviews with agents and scientists' viewers witness the actual process of some of the FBI's most famous investigations.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Trail
programme.desc: The disappearance of young women triggered a search that spanned the Pacific Northwest. A massive media campaign failed to locate the drifter, who first charmed then killed them. As investigators followed his trail, he always stayed one step ahead.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Temple of Fear
programme.desc: In Miami, the discovery of a mutilated body sent investigators on the trail of a deadly cult. But agents found a wall of silence around the cult's members. Potential witnesses, terrified of reprisals, refused to talk.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Held For Ransom
programme.desc: Wealth has its rewards, but it also brings its dangers. Kidnapping is one of them. No ordeal is more horrifying for a family than to have a child taken.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dishonored
programme.desc: Shirley Russell was determined enough to reach the rank of Captain in the United States Marine Corps. When this officer turned up missing, her colleagues refused to believe she had gone AWOL. It was unclear whether Captain Shirley Russell was alive.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Brutal Abduction
programme.desc: A Chicago street gang thought they had figured out how to kidnap people for ransom again and again, and never get caught. But their one mistake was they underestimated the Federal Bureau of Investigation.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Coffee Shop Murders
programme.desc: At a coffee shop in Washington, DC, three employees were shot to death. Evidence at the crime scene pointed in many different directions. Was this a hate crime, a robbery gone wrong or an act of cold-blooded vengeance?

programme.title: The FBI Files: Backstage Murder
programme.desc: In the 1980's, two partners created a nightclub that would bring them wealth and international fame. The male strip club phenomenon promised female patrons fun and excitement. But the bright lights hid a dark side.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Death In The Delta
programme.desc: When a wealthy young woman was abducted in front of her in-laws' home, the police had no shortage of suspects. The 25-year-old victim left behind a tumultuous marriage, an ex-husband and old boyfriends. All were on the FBI's short list.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a tragic murder led agents into the frightening world of domestic terrorism. Law enforcement vowed to dismantle the violent faction that claimed responsibility.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Heist
programme.desc: In Arizona, an armored van loaded with cash failed to reach its destination. Authorities suspected an inside job. When the vehicle was recovered with the drivers and the cash missing, those suspicions grew even more.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Lost Boys
programme.desc: In June of 1997, a crime wave swept Iowa like a tornado. It left a trail of robbery, kidnapping, and murder in its wake, and then it moved on. No one knew where.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Hunter's Target
programme.desc: Over a thousand hunting accidents are reported in the United States each year. Fewer than ten percent of them are fatal. But when one hunter's death seemed suspicious, the FBI was called in to investigate.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Shattered Shield
programme.desc: In a city awash in narcotics the drug lords have all the power even over the police. Corruption in New Orleans grew like cancer, eating away at public safety and threatening to destroy the city. Crooked cops break the laws they were sworn to uphold.

programme.title: FBI Files
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: FBI: Criminal Pursuit

programme.desc: The Burj Dubai holds the title as the tallest man-made structure ever built. Pushing the technological envelope. Near India's capital Delhi, the Qutub Minar reigns supreme for almost a thousand years as the world's tallest brick minaret.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers
programme.desc: On a an island the size of Singapore, water scarcity is a dire issue. The solution is the construction of an urban reservoir, the first of its kind in the world. Together with cutting edge technology, Singapore is on its way to water sufficiency.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers: Episode 3
programme.desc: Tankers are the workhorses of our modern economy and the largest of these are built in Korea. Features like double-hulls and multiple tanks have pushed the cargo and safety capacity of tankers to new heights, making them the mainstay of the oil industry.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers: Episode 4
programme.desc: For years, the roads of Mumbai were a hotbed of congestion and overcrowding. Now, a dynamic link road promises to ease the city's traffic woes. But the construction of Mumbai's first double-tiered flyover has been anything but easy.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers: Episode 5
programme.desc: The largest airport terminal in the world in Beijing is an engineering marvel that nonetheless pays strict adherence to the principles of Chinese fengshui, and marks a new footnote in an age-old tradition of building big.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers: Episode 6
programme.desc: It is the world's deepest immersed Tunnel. The Marmaray Project promises to ease Istanbul's decades-old traffic woes. Located in an earthquake zone, it is an engineer feat that is only rivalled by the discovery of a nearby ancient port.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers: Episode 7
programme.desc: Self declared 8th Wonder of the World, the Palm trilogy are the largest man-made islands in the world. Employing technology like satellite positioning, it has broken new records and engineering milestones.

programme.title: Ingenuity - Engineering Ground Breakers: Episode 8
programme.desc: The Three Gorges Dam is the largest hydro-electric dam in the world. That it is a sheer engineering marvel cannot be denied. Yet questions abound over environmental and social issues, not to mention logistics problems of moving ships up and down river.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Creator
programme.desc: Creating is a deed that captivates minds. Today, we are better creators than ever before. We will see how we can play with conditions for creating life, make anything we can think of with the code of life itself, and replace parts of our body.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Conqueror
programme.desc: Humankind conquered the world, in order to survive, and conquers his fellow humans with new ideas. We will see how we as a species have conquered the earth, how we still compete with viruses, and how quantum theory conquers China.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Maker
programme.desc: The maker grasps humankind as builders. We make new constructions with building blocks from nature, which we manipulate at the same time. We will see how that leads us to new materials, new connections between people and new bursts of creativity.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Explorer
programme.desc: The explorer peers beyond our known borders and discloses the unknown. We will get a glimpse of the secrets of life, both on earth and elsewhere in the universe, and zoom in on the peculiar history of our own planet. What are the borders yet to cross?

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Illusionist
programme.desc: As humans, we construct our view of reality from the input provided by our senses. How does that work? And how can we make a robot experience something similar? What would the world be like with human minds and artificial ones living together?

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Dreamer
programme.desc: It is through our wildest dreams that we achieve new knowledge. We see dreams of feeding the world with insects, dreams of a synthesis of the fundamental theories of physics, and dreams of our future as extra-terrestrials.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Searcher
programme.desc: We keep expanding our knowledge, and sometimes we know exactly what we are looking for. Patterns in apparent chaos, new elements or a key for translating old and forgotten languages. We are sure they exist.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Player
programme.desc: Humans and animals play and this renders them familiar with their environments. We zoom in on scientists who combine play and mathematics, and see how playing with matter yields new materials with special properties.

programme.title: Mind of the Universe: The Thinker
programme.desc: Our brains are constantly aware of our place in reality. How does this work for animals? Does an objective reality even exist, and does it leave any room for something like god? Where will our thinking lead us?

programme.title: Pluto TV Science
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: In the little town of Greendale lives Sabrina Spellman, a cute twelve year-old with a big heart and an even bigger secret. Sabrina is half mortal and half witch!

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Wag the Witch
programme.desc: Sabrina competes with Gem for office of Class President. They play dirty until Gem accuses her of being weird. Sabrina goes to disastrous lengths to prove her wrong.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Living Her Dreams
programme.desc: Sabrina is having a tough week. Cassandra, Margaux, and Tiffany are being a pain at school. Her aunts blame her for a mess Salem made in her room. Even reliable Harvey seems to be ignoring her (a misunderstanding).

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Spell-Ing Bee
programme.desc: It’s Witch vs. Witch in the annual spell-a-thon, and Sabrina is determined she is going to cast the biggest and best spell of all.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Field Trippin'
programme.desc: Sabrina, desperate to earn money for an upcoming concert, baby sits the terror twins. Hilda, Zelda and Uncle Quigley warn her that she's just not ready but Sabrina is adamant.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: At The Hop
programme.desc: Cassandra asks Harvey to a school dance only to find that Maritza beat her to it. When Sabrina hears, she is crushed. She thought Maritza was her friend.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: I Got Glue Babe
programme.desc: Everyone is fed up with Sabrina and Gem's constant rivalry. Sabrina casts a spell to make Gem and herself closer. But she uses too much potion and it causes them to stick together.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Cat Man Do
programme.desc: Salem is terrified to learn that the evil Toc-Toc is being released from suspended animation (a Netherworld corrections facility) for a crime Salem committed!

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Most Dangerous Witch
programme.desc: Tim the Witchsmeller is a disgruntled half witch who can perform no magic, and boy is he bitter.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Witchy Grrrls
programme.desc: Sabrina's band, the Flavor Babes, use a little magic to launch their careers. The much desired fame and riches end up tearing Sabrina, Chloe, Hilda and Zelda apart.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Food 'Tude
programme.desc: Sabrina is given cafeteria work for two weeks (all students rotate through). She’s cramming for a big test coming up in Ms.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: What’s In A Name?
programme.desc: Sabrina and Cassandra bicker their way through another potion-making assignment at the witches’ academy. Their arguing causes them to spill the entire vial of Salvia Muscaria: an extremely rare herb!

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Nothin' Says Lovin' Like Something From a Coven
programme.sub-title: Nothin' Says Lovin' Like Something From a Coven
programme.desc: After being dissed from Gem's Halloween party, Sabrina throws a Halloween party of her own.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: And Baby Makes 3
programme.desc: Hilda and Zelda are going to the Netherworld for some much needed Rest & Relaxation (it’s the witch equivalent of going to Las Vegas). Although Sabrina does everything her power to dissuade them, they insist on hiring a babysitter.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Pet Peeve
programme.desc: Sabrina wishes she had a pet. Oh, Salem’s okay as a pal, but as a loving furball, he doesn’t cut it.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Paranormal Pi
programme.desc: When Pi sees Sabrina's Uncle Zamboni flying through the air he is convinced there are paranormal rumblings in Greendale. He makes it his mission to prove it to the townspeople.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: You Said a Mouse-Ful
programme.desc: Salem eats Sabrina's prize mouse for her science fair exhibit. After much blackmailing on Sabrina's part, she gets Salem to morph into a mouse to take its place.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Hex-Change Students
programme.desc: Gem hosts two exchange students to be cool. Instead of the real foreigners, Dawson and Felicity, show up instead. Psst! They are really mischievous faeries.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Matchmaker Sabrina
programme.desc: Sabrina finds a forbidden spell book on Mr. Snipe’s desk and casts a spell to make him fall in love with the first person he sees.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: The Grandparent Trap
programme.desc: When Sabrina hears that her Grandparents are coming for visit she is excited. They have a important announcement to make.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: The Hex Files
programme.desc: Sabrina is excited to visit Uncle Quigley in his lab while taking a field trip to the observatory.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: This is Your Nine Lives
programme.desc: It's Salem's birthday and he's used to getting the lavish gifts. Sabrina thinks her homemade gift sucks so she time travels to get him a unique gift...

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Green-Eyed Monster
programme.desc: Sabrina is obsessing over the whole romantic triangle thing with Harvey and Cassandra.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Greendale Idol
programme.desc: At the witches’ academy, the Sabrina and Cassandra learn about the dangers of using magic carelessly.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Stage Fright
programme.desc: Sabrina needs a little lesson in true love for her Shakespeare play. While Zelda just needs a date. They conjure up Romeo to teach them the ropes.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Boggie Shoes
programme.desc: Sabrina is psyched about school dance and can't understand why Harvey doesn't want to go.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Teacher's Pet
programme.desc: Sabrina is shocked when Salem shows up at the witches’ academy one day, and tries to hide him from the faculty.

programme.title: Sabrina's Secret Life: Hot Item
programme.desc: While shopping with Sabrina, Maritza ogles a necklace that Cassandra buys. Knowing how much Maritza wants it, the unkind young witch uses it to taunt Maritza.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: The Student of the Year winner will be announced soon and Sabrina and Gem are tied to win. Gem uses her money to win the contest so Sabrina uses magic to make Gem lose.

programme.title: Sabrina The Animated Series: The Senses-Shattering Adventures of Captain Harvtastic
programme.sub-title: The Senses-Shattering Adventures of Captain Harvtastic
programme.desc: Harvey lacks the courage to show his comic book to the great comic book creator, King Kirby. Sabrina decides to give Harvey a Wishing Star in hopes that he'll wish for courage.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Home helps turn your home into your castle! We will inspire you to give your home a new look. No matter if you want your home to look like a castle or a sleek city apartment, we will present you with a wide range of different looks and shows.

programme.title: Inside Out Homes: Newcastle

programme.title: Inside Out Homes: London & Harrogate
programme.desc: Zac is in West London, hoping to prove that concrete is the perfect material for inside-out living. And Californians Abbey and Zahed seek a West Coast vibe in Harrogate with a double-height feature.

programme.title: Inside Out Homes: Flat & Tudor Semi
programme.desc: Zac creates an inside out home in a flat with no outside space and gives a mock Tudor suburban semi a radical overhaul, placing the kitchen in a courtyard.

programme.title: Inside Out Homes: Surrey

programme.title: Pure Design

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Longtime homeowners Carolyn and Derek have a wonderfully unconventional style - funky, colourful and a bit playful - but it never reached their home's top floor.

programme.title: Pure Design

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Lindsay has outgrown her childhood bedroom and is ready to leave her hand-me-down furniture and kiddy colours in the past.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Professional photographer Virginia loves her cottage-style home in the city - but lately it doesn't love her back.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Olivia's grandmother lived in this house her whole life. When she went into a home about 4 months ago, Olivia couldn't bear to see it sold to a stranger and purchased it.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Lauren and Mike call themselves 'the hand-me-down' family. Although they're into re-using and re-purposing pieces.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Lori and Jason bought a beautiful old house about 3 years ago and renovated the entire place, except for an awkward old kitchen space that's attached to their son Atticus's room.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Erin and Ryan are an active, eco-conscious and newly engaged couple with little time to think about decorating their living space.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Paula, Pete and their 2 children, Ava (9) and Eric (13) moved back to Toronto from Vancouver in August.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Chetna and Bhups have moved around a lot. They've live in L.A., Britain and Asia. In January 2009, they bought a house and settled in Canada. Because they have been moving around a lot, they haven't had a change to collect heirloom pieces.

programme.title: Pure Design
programme.desc: Sam's Mom, Colleen Pynn hasn't had the time to re-decorate her home. She has been in this house for 14 years and she's always liked it just the way it is. But over the past few years, she's started to softy ask Sam about re-designing her kitchen.

programme.title: Pure Design

channel.desc: Pluto TV Nature is all-natural! We want to give the viewer a pure look at all things nature by giving them an unobstructed view on the amazing places around the world and discover new animals and places.

programme.title: Full Force Nature: Episode 210
programme.desc: Hurricane Katrina tears through a town... forcing victims to scramble to rooftops and swim for their lives. A wedding is crashed by a monster sandstorm. A daring helicopter rescue saves an elderly couple from raging floodwaters.

programme.title: Full Force Nature: Episode 211
programme.desc: A truck flips on flooded roads, trapping a family in their upside down car. A thrill seeking photographer gets too close to a hurricane. A chaser flips his car in a wild tornado chase. A mudslide sends a truck over a steep incline.

programme.title: Full Force Nature: Episode 212
programme.desc: A pair of truck drivers get stranded in a flood…and men on jet skis zoom in to the rescue.

programme.title: Appalachia - The Endless Forest
programme.desc: The Appalachians form a vast mountain chain, stretching along the Eastern side of the USA, from Georgia in the south to Maine in the north.

programme.title: Magic of the Mountains
programme.desc: This is the story of a land, where forces of nature are at play - beyond all things that a human can ever dominate or be able to conquer.

programme.title: Alaska: Spirit of the Wild
programme.desc: Witness a poetic story of survival in the harsh conditions of Alaska.

programme.title: Antarctica
programme.desc: For the first time in history the mysterious icy expanse of the highest, driest and coldest continent has been captured in the giant screen format. Experience the life and drama of Antarctica like never before.

programme.title: Coral Reef Adventure
programme.desc: Coral Reef Adventure follows the real-life expedition of ocean explorers and underwater filmmakers Howard and Michele Hall. The Halls guide us to the islands and sun-drenched waters of the South Pacific to document the health and beauty of coral reefs.

programme.title: Flight of the Aquanaut
programme.desc: Flight of the Aquanaut is set against startling undersea vistas and tells a gripping tale of a diver's voyage into danger. Equipped with a self-propelled, one-atmosphere "hard suit," the aquanaut sweeps viewers along on a dramatic science adventure.

programme.title: Island Adventure: Island Adventure (1996)
programme.desc: A journey through the most inaccessible and amazing places of a volcanic island. Three characters are looking for a "missing photographer" and end up right in the heart of a volcanic eruption.

programme.title: Journey into Amazing Caves: Journey into Amazing Caves (12001)
programme.desc: Follow two accomplished female cavers as they descend deep inside treacherous and beautiful ice caves in Greenland, underwater labyrinths in Mexico's steamy Yucutan Peninsula and twisted caverns within the walls of the Grand Canyon.

programme.title: Volcanoes of the Deep Sea
programme.desc: Plunge into the ocean 12,000 feet deep for an unprecedented experience of this vast and little-explored dimension of our planet. The film follows a team of scientists as they dive to research mysterious hydrothermal vents on the mid-ocean ridge.

programme.title: Welcome to the Cave of Wonders
programme.desc: A visual documentary that strives to show a glimpse into one of the most beautiful creations on earth from its unfathomable beginning millions of years ago to what it has become today.

programme.title: Wonders of the Arctic
programme.desc: Our ongoing quest to explore and come to terms with the Arctic is presented in the context of the crucial role that ice plays in the north. It is the underpinning of the ecosystem, the foundation upon which the animals and plants of the north depend.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet: Rumbling Earth
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau explores the cause of volcanoes, earthquakes and tsunamis.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet: Extinction Earth
programme.desc: Philippe uncovers how we could face extinction, including Yellowstone's super volcano, and asteroids.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet: Ecosystems
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau visits various ecosystems around the country, including Yellowstone National Park.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet: Extreme Weather

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet: Plants

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: Philippe Cousteau explores the icy and fiery parts of our world.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Space goes to infinity and beyond for you! On this channel, we discover new worlds and show you that there is a so much more to discover. This is a compilation the best factual programs about Space and new frontiers that are out there.

programme.title: In the Shadow of the Moon
programme.desc: Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: Moon Shots: Inside the Lost Apollo Archive
programme.desc: The world famous Apollo missions are some of the greatest feats ever accomplished by man. With rare archive footage and unprecedented access to life on board the Apollo spacecrafts, this stunning one-hour special brings scientific history to life.

programme.title: Neil Armstrong: One Small Step
programme.desc: Neil Armstrong has stamped his place in history by becoming the first person to walk on the moon.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gravity
programme.desc: This film features unexpected historical insights, cutting-edge science and exciting new experiments. From Einstein's Relativity to quantum mechanics, host Jim Al-Khalili explores one of the most extraordinary phenomena in our universe.

programme.title: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1
programme.desc: Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 2
programme.desc: In this episode, hear first hand testimonials and dialogue from the incredible men who walked on the moon. Incredible footage and photos give a unique and beautiful experience of their data collection process and journey home.

programme.title: The Mystery of Dark Matter: The Mystery of Dark Matter
programme.desc: Dark matter, which is unknown and undetectable in our physical models, would appear to populate the cosmos on a massive scale. For the first time, a film portrays the wild scientific quest that dark matter gives rise to - a real thriller!

programme.title: The Truth is in the Stars
programme.desc: Does our society have the capacity to live up to Star Trek's optimistic vision for humanity's future? William Shatner takes us on a journey to find out whether art has imitated life in the years since the world-renowned TV series premiered in 1966.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris
programme.desc: Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.sub-title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Pluto TV Space

programme.desc: After Rebecca and Henry get engaged, they gather their families for the holidays to surprise them with the good news. But will their clashing families ever get along?

programme.title: I'll Be Homeless for Christmas
programme.desc: When a petty thief learns that his latest mark is a struggling single mother who works at a homeless shelter, he decides to use his savvy street smarts to make this Christmas one to remember for her and her young son.

programme.title: Wicker Park
programme.desc: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His belief leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold in order to trail her. Starring: Josh Hartnett, Diane Kruger, Matthew Lillard, Rose Byrne

programme.title: The Flight Before Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Mayim Bialik and Ryan McPartlin. Two strangers offer to share the last remaining room at a bed-and-breakfast when a snowstorm strands their flight in Montana on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Love Exclusively
programme.desc: When an ambitious reporter is recruited by to play cupid to famous pop musicians Caleb Greene and Carson Peet in return for an exclusive story over Valentine's weekend, she soon realizes Caleb has his sights set on her.

programme.title: Cup of Love
programme.desc: Zoe Walker is a food scientist who's been sent to Colombia to design a coffee flavor that appeals to millennials. In the village of Salento, Zoe meets Diego Valdez, a local plantation owner who is reluctant to work with her.

programme.title: Under the Greenwood Tree
programme.desc: A love story grows between local boy Dick Dewey and beautiful schoolteacher Fancy Day. But in seeking her hand in marriage penniless Dick finds himself in competition with other more likely suitors.

programme.title: Beauty
programme.desc: Alix Miller is commissioned to paint a gentleman's portrait at his breathtaking country estate, but her subject is more challenging than she imagined.

channel.desc: Watch Jerry Springer, Maury Povich, Steve Wilkos, Blind Date, and more on Nosey, your one stop shop for your favorite shows.

programme.sub-title: Maury Guest Updates…I'm Back with a Secret!

programme.sub-title: 5 Men Tested… Are Any of Them My Baby's Dad?

programme.sub-title: I'm Back for My 3rd Test... I'll Prove I'm Not the Father Again

programme.sub-title: I Saw You Cheat With a Stripper!
programme.desc: Maury's guests are sick and tired of their men cheating on them. Can Maury find out the truth and will these relationships survive? Tune in today!

programme.title: The Maury Show: DNA Tests Will Prove You Have 10 Kids!
programme.sub-title: DNA Tests Will Prove You Have 10 Kids!

programme.sub-title: Did You Ever Have My Baby?

programme.desc: Monique wants to prove that Chris attacked her when he gave her a ride home after a party. But Chris denies any wrongdoing, and says Monique was too drunk to know what happened.

programme.title: Glamour Puds: Careme in Russia

programme.title: Worst Cooks in America: Looking Good

programme.title: Worst Cooks in America: Feelin' the Flavor
programme.desc: To illustrate the importance of flavor, the chefs provide the eight remaining recruits with a "blank canvas," jointly demonstrating a basic crepe dish.

programme.title: Worst Cooks in America: Multitasking
programme.desc: To show the importance of multitasking, each chef teaches their team how to make fresh pasta, filling and sauce.

programme.title: Worst Cooks in America: Are You Ready
programme.desc: Each chef teaches their two recruits a complicated dessert. Then, to test their retention of the recipe, the recruits must teach the dish to people who know even less about cooking than they do: high school football players!

programme.title: Worst Cooks in America: Final Test
programme.desc: The remaining two recruits meet their chefs at boot camp to devise and plan menus for their final challenge: to prepare a three-course meal for food critics.

channel.desc: THE NEW DETECTIVES profiles the work of world-renowned forensics experts and criminal investigators and the techniques they use to solve murders and other crimes.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Left At The Scene
programme.desc: The tiniest residue left at the scene can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Short Fuse
programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which was mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid, the box exploded, killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Dead Men Do Talk
programme.desc: Profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts and the procedures they use to solve murders and other mysteries in minutes or centuries after they happen.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Cold Blooded
programme.desc: Time of death is an important consideration in a murder investigation, but when a killer freezes, burns, or grinds his victim, even the most skilled medical examiner would be at a loss about how to calculate it.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Cold Cases
programme.desc: These cases took a decade or more to solve. There's no statute of limitations on murder. As a case turns cold, the clues become scarce, investigators must rely on science to close cold cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Short Fuse
programme.desc: Explosives Investigations: The crime lab is the place where science meets murder. In New York State, Eleanor Fowler opened a small package, which as mailed to her home. When she lifted the lid the box exploded killing her instantly.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Proof Of Innocence
programme.desc: DNA analysis overturns the convictions of three men who have spent years behind bars, paying for crimes they did not commit.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Burning Evidence
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Medical Examiners's Casebook
programme.desc: Some killers choose to hide their victims. And investigators must then rely on forensic examiners to uncover proof of murder. These are just two extraordinary crimes that have made their way into the medical examiner's casebook.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Blind Trust
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Deadly Target
programme.desc: Ballistics: A corpse is found with a gunshot wound to the head; the weapon lies next to the victim. It looks like suicide, but could it be murder? It's a question best solved by ballistics experts.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Critical Evidence
programme.desc: To the astute detective and forensic specialist, the biggest clues often hide in plain sight, and what seems trivial to some is in reality Critical Evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Burning Evidence
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Three hairs microscopic fibers a common trash bag ripped from a roll. Seemingly small and insignificant clues become a victim's silent witness.

programme.title: The New Detectives

channel.desc: Michelin Star-winner Gordon Ramsay’s five-time Emmy-nominated show Hell’s Kitchen, shows us how aspiring chefs compete to become head chef at one of Gordon’s prestigious restaurants. Who can survive the temper of Gordon Ramsay & his Hell’s Kitchen?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 2 Chefs Compete (Part One)
programme.desc: The two finalists must work with an architect to design restaurant spaces for their final dinner service competition.

programme.desc: The final two contestants square off in their last dinner service competition. The winner gets the head chef job at the Borgata Hotel, Casino and Spa in Atlantic City.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 16 Chefs Compete
programme.desc: In part one of the season premiere, sixteen contestants get a shot at culinary stardom and an executive chef position in the Canadian resort town of Whistler, British Columbia.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 15 Chefs Compete

programme.desc: Chef Ramsay wakes up the remaining chefs in the middle of the night and orders them to prepare a spaghetti dinner for hungry firefighters. The losers must wash and wax fire engines.

programme.desc: The remaining chefs must create three-course meals that only total 700 calories. The winners hit the beach with Olympic beach volleyball player Annett Davis.

programme.desc: The remaining chefs make crepes. The winners will dine at a French restaurant while the losers prepare for a French-themed dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 7 Chefs Compete

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 6 Chefs Compete
programme.desc: The six remaining contestants must replicate the dishes that Chef Ramsay prepared for them. The winners will dine with season four winner Christina Machamer.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 5 Chefs Compete
programme.desc: The challenge for each of the remaining contestants is to make a dish that looks as good as it tastes. Experts from "Bon Appetit" magazine help Chef Ramsay judge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 4 Chefs Compete
programme.desc: The contestants meet a miniature version of Chef Ramsay: British child actor and impressionist Felix Light. They must prepare meat-free meals for him and eighty other youngsters.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen: 3 Chefs Compete

channel.desc: Crime Investigation Australia, the ultimate destination for true crime, uncovers its country’s most horrific crimes that shocked the nation. Watch chilling re-enactments & interviews and witness how police & forensic investigators solve the case.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Murder of Innocence: Sian Kingi
programme.desc: On 27 November 1987, 12-year-old Noosa school girl Sian Kingi was grabbed off her push bike by Valmae Fay Beck and Barrie John Watts as she rode home from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser
programme.desc: Serial killer Leonard Fraser was suspected of killing at least five women over a 17 year period but took the complete truth about his life of crime to his grave.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.sub-title: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.sub-title: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.sub-title: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.sub-title: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.sub-title: Contract to Kill / The Mornington Monster
programme.desc: Crime Investigation Australia has conducted a major investigation which reveals the inside story of the Megan Kalajzich murder and the extraordinary police investigation which will rock the Harbour City's elite to the core.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.sub-title: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.

channel.desc: Crashes, smashes and hilarious mud splashes are on the cards as twenty contestants take on one of television's largest and most extreme obstacle courses.

programme.sub-title: Slippery Stairs and Wipeout Crash Cream

programme.title: Wipeout Canada: Wipeout Workout

channel.desc: Undercover Boss takes real life big corporation CEOs out of their comfort zone, to work undercover within their own companies amongst their unsuspecting workforce. Will they be satisfied with what they uncover?

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Motor has a need for speed! On this channel, we celebrate everything that moves fast and has power. From classic cars to renovating old planes. We will show you how it is done.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Camaro Cash-In
programme.desc: Charles and Trey stumble across a 1970 Z28 Chevrolet Camaro deep in the bayou in major need of restoration. If Charles can authenticate and fix this once sought after machine, he could be looking at a lot of money.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Voodoo Demon
programme.desc: Charles and Trey happen across a rare 1972 Dodge Demon driving through the streets of New Orleans. After snagging it for $2,500 they have just one week to transform it into the ultimate 1970's street machine.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: The Ballad of El Camino
programme.desc: After haggling down to a pretty reasonable price, Trey and Charles fight to bring a trashed up collectors dream back to life--a 1968 Chevy El Camino. On top of already being ridden with rust, the team must also find a way to turn a profit.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Heavy Chevy
programme.desc: Charles and Trey are hired to fix local legend and rock star Pepper Keenan's 1955 Chevrolet. In an effort to build business, they take on the challenge of rebuilding the engine to crank out 400+ horsepower for only $17,000.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Big Easy Bandit
programme.desc: Charles and Trey find their new project in a Pontiac Firebird Trans Am in their pal's junkyard. After further research Charles finds out it's a rare Trans Am referred to as the "Bandit Edition".

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: The Wild One
programme.desc: Charles and Trey head to a farm just outside of town to purchased their latest project--a run down 1967 Ford Mustang. After discovering its rarity, they must decide whether to take it back to stock or soup it up.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Po' Boy Pantera
programme.desc: The Bomb Factory has an opportunity to buy an extremely rare exotic muscle car. Since the asking price is too much, they go in on the car with a financial backer.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Mission Commission
programme.desc: After chasing it for an entire year, Charles finally finds and buys the classy 1962 Chrysler 300 he's been dreaming of. He and his team now face the challenge of having only ten days to give it the period correct customization.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Bet on the 'Vette
programme.desc: In an eerie abandoned warehouse, Charles discovers more than just ghosts--hidden in a damp corner, under a sheet, he finds a sleek, 1959 Chevrolet Corvette.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Maverick Mojo
programme.desc: When Charles and Trey snag a 1970 Ford Maverick Grabber along with a parts car, they're bringing in something a little more personal.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: The Franken-Fury
programme.desc: After a local lawyer informs Charles and Trey of an estate sale, they race over to find a rare 1968 Plymouth Fury 3. Because the Fury was seen simply as a conventional 60's family vehicle, it was overlooked by many vintage car collectors.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Get My Goat
programme.desc: With the business of the Bomb Factory growing, the team is hired by a man who is looking to create the car of his childhood dreams--a 1967 Pontiac GTO capable of going 0-60 mph in under 5 seconds.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Bayou Bronco
programme.desc: Charles and Trey get a call from a man deep in the Bayou looking to unload his 1971 Ford Bronco. The duo hope to revamp this pony in time for a classic car auction a few weeks away. Since Broncos aren't the typical car featured at a classic car auction.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Mystery Trike
programme.desc: Charles and Trey get a lead on a possible Ed Roth Trike, a three-wheeled monster that is motorcycle in the front and car in the back. While Trey is hesitant about the authenticity of purchase due to lack of documentation, Charles trusts his gut.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Charged Up
programme.desc: Trey and Frankie get a call about a 1974 Dodge Charger down at the used car lot. It's in pretty good shape, but with another auction only a few weeks away, the Bomb Factory will need to soup up this muscle car in record time.

programme.title: Big Easy Motors: Crescent City Cuda
programme.desc: The guys are asked by famed car collector, Tim Wellborne, to create the "most beautiful car that never was"-- the 1970 Paint Chip 'Cuda to feature in his musclecar museum.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Big Block Bonding
programme.desc: Jim Bussell and his son Chance have a real need for speed. While on the hunt for a car they can bond over, they check out in a rare '72 Barracuda that might take a chomp out of Jim's wallet, a 1970 Nova with surprisingly modern features.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Fastbacks and the Furious
programme.desc: Dallas Choat from Albion Nebraska is on the hunt for a new ride to cruise around town in style. Faced with this tough decision, he puts the pedal to the metal on three high-octane test drives. First, Dallas burns rubber in '67 Mustang Fastback.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Highs and Lows
programme.desc: Luis Mendoza has worked on other peoples' low-riders for years, but he's never owned one himself. However, that's all about to change, if he can decide what to spend his hard earned cash on.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Buick Bounty
programme.desc: Tim Sweely is a die-hard Buick fanatic who has finally saved up enough to buy one of his own. His hunt for his perfect Buick puts him in the driver's seat of a luxurious '59 Buick Super, a sleek convertible '65 Buick Wildcat.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Roads Of Glory
programme.desc: John Dishong is an empty nester who wants to recapture his youth with a car from his past. First up, a '74 Dodge Dart hits the bulls eye on price; then a '70 Buick Electra sparks a jolt of nostalgia...

programme.title: Car Hunters: Couple's Cruiser
programme.desc: Donald and Cora Durbin are busy parents to four young kids, so they're looking for a classic ride to make their rare date nights extra special. On their hunt they check out a unique '63 Studebaker GT Hawk, a classic '48 Chrysler Windsor convertible.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Investment Ignition
programme.desc: Ron and his wife Angie are looking for a fun convertible that's also a smart investment. On their hunt, they test drive a zippy '59 Porsche 356 replica, a smoking-hot '58 Chevy Corvette, and a numbers-matching '66 Corvette Sting Ray.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Drop Top and Roll
programme.desc: Former correctional officer Mark Piland wants to kick of his retirement in style by checking something off his bucket list: owning a classic convertible. First up, a '66 Pontiac LeMans with a powerful V8 engine; then a '71 Mercury Cougar.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Style for Miles
programme.desc: Kelly Huff is an LA based music producer who's on the hunt for a 50s classic that's as original as he is. Along the way he finds an immaculate '57 Ford Thunderbird that drives like a dream, a '56 Mercury Monterey that takes him straight down memory lane.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Motor City Memories
programme.desc: Jim Welch fell in love with classic cars growing up in Detroit, and he's finally ready to buy one of his own. On his hunt, Jim zips down the road in a '71 Plymouth Road Runner, flies by in a '69 Pontiac Firebird 400.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Muscle Mission
programme.desc: Rick Blough is an army veteran who wants to fulfill his lifelong dream of owning a classic car. On his hunt, he test drives a '57 Chevy Bel Air upgraded with the latest parts and technology, a '66 Ford Mustang with a smokin' hot red paint job.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Generation Restoration
programme.desc: Growing up, Aaron Leider spent quality time working on cars with his dad. Now he and his own son are on the hunt for a car they can restore together. On their search they check out a '69 Lincoln Continental Mark III with a surprise up its sleeve.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Burning Rubber
programme.desc: Sonny Recla is a Dallas firefighter with a true love for classic cars, and he's looking for a new ride to cruise around town in. On his hunt, he test drives a beautiful but compact '55 Ford Thunderbird, a '75 Oldsmobile Hurst with plenty of power.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Rural Rider
programme.desc: Suzi Fife is a busy mom who's looking for a cool sports utility vehicle to remind her of her childhood days on a farm. Along the way, she checks out a '78 International Harvester Scout II with vintage appeal, a souped up '70 Ford Bronco with a 3-speed.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Fast Money
programme.desc: Jimmy Kent has been in love with cars since he was a teenager, and now he's in the market for a classic sports car that's also be a smart investment.

programme.title: Car Hunters: Chip Off the Old Big Block
programme.sub-title: Chip Off the Old Big Block
programme.desc: Growing up around his father's hotrods, Clint Hrabal always dreamed of owning one of his own. His search puts him behind the wheel of a classic '34 Ford Pickup hotrod with a huge engine.
