channel.desc: Go on the prowl with real-life bounty hunter Duane "Dog" Chapman, his wife Beth, and their family as they chase down fugitives in the Hawaiian islands. The hunt is on, and Dog always gets his man on this exclusive 24/7 channel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Going after two fugitives in one day is tough enough without the facing Colorado's notoriously unpredictable weather. Today, it's the threat of severe thunderstorms, hail and area wide tornado warnings.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jack & Jill
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Island Hopper
programme.desc: When a brother bondsman from Washington State calls Dog for help tracking a runner in search of fun in the sun on the tropical paradise of Kauai, the team gets on the case. Dog's only problem? No leads!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Nice Guys Finish Last
programme.desc: Dog and team help out a bondsman friend whose client jumped bail, but the target is a blank slate. Are his tattoos gang related? Is he likely to be violent? And making matters worse, when they hit his apartment they learn he is moving out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars
programme.desc: While tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five year stretch in the big house, Leland struggles to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Man
programme.desc: Dog and family head to Kona to track down a wanted father who's looking to bolt to the mainland to evade sentencing. Meanwhile, Dog does some evading of his own - Avoiding the much dreaded birthday party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Courage
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Duck Dynasty has its very own 24/7 channel! Expect plenty of outlandish behaviour, feuds, comedy & of course…ducks, all in this rags-to-riches reality series.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty

channel.desc: When ordinary people are put in extraordinary situations, it can bring out the best or worst in anyone. Get into the real-life drama here on Pluto TV Lives, with the most fun & outlandish docuseries on TV whenever you want them.

programme.title: Alaska State Troopers: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: From a woman trapped in auto accident wreckage to a romance gone sour, to crystal meth drug runners, Alaska's finest are put to the test of every challenge.

programme.title: Alaska State Troopers: Drunk and Dangerous
programme.desc: Danger is on the rise as flooding takes over south-central Alaska. A 17-inch storm surge and high winds have left thousands in danger and even uprooted residential homes.

programme.title: Alaska State Troopers: Crystal Meth Compund
programme.desc: Like a scene from an action movie, Troopers silently and swiftly surround the home of a well-known criminal suspected of hiding stolen guns.

programme.title: Alaska State Troopers: Trooper Stalker
programme.desc: Talk about a long commute! Trooper Massey must drive to the airport, catch an airplane and be picked up by a patrol boat to get from St. Mary's to Alakanuk.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Heartache
programme.desc: Riding high after their success on the Bigfoot job, and frustrated with Jerry's constant sabotage, Krystal and Lea take a huge gamble by moving their hog hunting operation to Florida.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Turning Point
programme.desc: Jerry is left pondering his future as a hog hunter. Tom, Lea and Krystal meet with a dog trainer client whose stock is threatened by hogs.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Swamped
programme.desc: Krystal and Lea clash with Tom Walker while helping a cow rancher protect his herd, driving a wedge between them.

programme.title: American Hoggers: The Replacement
programme.desc: In Florida, Tom surprises the girls with some news: he's bringing in his friend Dynamite to help with the workload, and Krystal and Lea are forced to hunt alone with a sluggish vehicle and unfamiliar dogs.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Divide and Conquer
programme.desc: Tom proposes a friendly competition between the guys and girls to see who can catch more hogs. The girls agree, and add one condition: dead hogs don't count.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Hog-Blocking
programme.desc: The Campbells and Wild Women Hoggers continue to muscle over the same ranch.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Hogwash
programme.desc: After seeing Krystal at the homestead, Jerry misses his baby girl and wonders if he can ever truly replace her. Meanwhile, Krystal uses her semi-automatic and Lea slings arrows when they get a job hunting exotics.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Two Steps Forward
programme.desc: Jerry wishes he had Krystal back on the team, but he knows he's got to lean on Katie as the team plugs away on the Dean Smith job.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Campbell vs. Campbell
programme.desc: While Krystal and Lea battle cacti and barbed wire in an all-out fight to land a hog on the watermelon farm, Jerry is done feeling soft for her and says he's going to give her some tough love.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Junkyard Hog
programme.desc: After the loss of his lead hunting dog Jerry is ready to call off his hunting days for awhile while he trains a new dog. But Krystal and Robert are desperate to keep their fledgling business alive. Against Jerry's advice, Robert invests in new dogs.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Meet the Campbells
programme.desc: Lifelong Texan Jerry Campbell has been in the hog hunting game for over 50 years. His kids, Robert and Krystal, are hoping to turn Dad's lifestyle into a full-time family business helping landowners clear their property of destructive wild boars.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Man Down
programme.desc: The Campbells and their team of dogs tee off at a Texas golf course, where an aggressive hog is threatening golfers and tearing up $20,000 greens. But the hunt leaves Krystal and Robert concerned about Jerry's health and ability to keep hunting.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Life on the Line
programme.desc: The Campbells get a call from an elderly widow being terrorized by a massive 250 pound boar. At the job, the battle between Jerry's old ways and the kids' new methods turns the hunt into a family feud that descends into chaos.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Cage Match
programme.desc: The Campbells are faced with their biggest job yet: a 900-acre deer hunting ranch overrun with boars. Hoping to increase their hog hunting arsenal, Robert sinks more money into the family business by buying a hog trap.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: China's Dragon Road
programme.desc: In the south of China, in the Guizhou province, mountains cover 90% of the land. Within these mountains, two of the region's most vital and abundant resources are found.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Congo Katanga
programme.desc: In Katanga, many people are waiting for a train named after a bird, the “Swallow”. More than 2,000 people, three times the train’s capacity, are squeezing in the carriages.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Suriname
programme.desc: It is difficult to find Suriname on a map. But it is not imaginary. Suriname is found at the heart of the Amazon: a country of jungle.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Haiti
programme.desc: Haiti is the poorest country in the Caribbean. 5 years after the earthquake which hit Port-au-Prince and the surrounding areas, the effects of the catastrophe are still being felt.

programme.title: License to Drill: They're back
programme.desc: Two fearless crews brave harsh weather to drill for oil in the frozen Canadian North.

programme.title: Pluto TV Lives
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Divorced! Wronged! Hunted! On Judge Nosey, find the most intense real-life courtroom drama on TV with the likes of Divorce Court and Eye for An Eye, all here 24/7.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Exotic Erotic Ball
programme.desc: Dawn, a high-end exotic dancer, is suing her former talent manager for unpaid wages, stolen items, and hotel costs. Stegen argues that because he never got paid by the organizers he was not obligated to pay Dawn.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Wedding Thief
programme.desc: Carol is suing her husband for the money that he took out of her bank account for his wild bachelor party. Marion argues he was joint on the account and had every right to use the money

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Big Bro Botch
programme.desc: This car-crazy sister claims she was scammed by her big brother's bogus paint job. Now she wants her money back. But he claims he gave her a paint job to be proud of.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Princess Party Disaster
programme.desc: Tanya is suing her former friend for costs associated with a birthday that turned into a disaster. Richard argues that Tanya tried to leave his daughter's birthday party long before it was over so he had every right to stop her.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: All in the Family
programme.desc: Natash is suing her younger sister for damages to her home from wild parties that she threw. Cara-Lynn denies being solely responsible for the damage done to the home, claiming her sister was there partying with her.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Devil's in the Details
programme.desc: Laura is suing her former friend and workmate for the remainder of a $5000 loan. Caylee says the plaintiff offered money without any indication that it needed to be paid back and there was no alleged promissory note

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Please Stand By
programme.desc: Months ago Rosa's big-screen TV had a big-time problem, so she called Michael, a TV repairman, to come to fix it. She says that he took the TV and never brought it back and now she wants her money.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Tale of Two Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters who were once tight are now torn apart. Silcray claims her younger sister stole her belongings. Sylvia is shocked and appaled that she'd be accused of such claims after taking her sister into her home.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: What Happened to the Wii?
programme.desc: Herve Ambwa is accusing his cousin of selling his beloved Wii gaming console. Irvin swears he would never do such a thing and that is was stolen due to his roommate's negligence.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: A Ticking Timebomb
programme.desc: Candace is suing a used car salesman for a car she never kept. Scott claims that he offered her fifteen different cars before he realized that she was never going to be fully satisfied.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Heckling the Plaintiff
programme.desc: Comedian Allan Cunningham is suing his former fan for the money she owes him for a private party. Sandra claims that Allan deliberately insulted her family and ruined the party.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Too Sauced to Sign
programme.desc: Russell committed a crime so Linda gave him a loan for a lawyer. She says he wrote an IOU for his DUI but will the note count if he was too sauced to sign it?

programme.title: Judge Dad: AirPnP
programme.desc: Cliff is suing Miles for half of the security deposit from renting an Airbnb together. Cliff claims Miles caused damage and it came out of the security deposit they both paid. Miles claims Cliff fully participated, so they should share the expense.

programme.title: Judge Dad: Netflix and Chill
programme.desc: Lisa decided to share her Netflix account with Brandon only to find out that he had given access to others as well. Now she wants Brandon to pay, but he refuses, claiming that she's just mad because she wants to be more than friends with him.

programme.title: Judge Dad: Not My Corona
programme.desc: Helen is suing her neighbor, Justin, for giving her COVID-19. She says Justin ignored the rules posted in their building and entered the laundry room without a mask. Justin says he had not been diagnosed with COVID and did not have any symptoms.

programme.title: Judge Dad: Party in the Hood
programme.desc: Jennie is suing her brother, Charlie, for damage caused when he borrowed her car and took it to an outdoor meetup. Charlie refuses to pay because he said it wasn't his fault. He says Jennie let him use the car and that's what she has insurance for.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Ex
programme.desc: Andwela and Nicole came together after cheating on their spouses. Nicole feels like their marriage has been severely damaged due to his disloyalty and him trash talking her to his ex. Can this couple figure it out?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Old Town Road
programme.desc: Jennifer says Josh's lies have left her and their family homeless. He has made many hurtful decisions like selling her car and dumping her dog while she was giving birth to their son. Can he pave the way for a future?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 1
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

channel.desc: MythBusters explodes onto the screen, bringing with it two Hollywood special effects experts Jamie Hyneman and Adam Savage & attempt to debunk urban legends. Expect science, experiments, explosions & disasters!

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 46
programme.desc: Myths tested: What is the best cure for seasickness? Is it more efficient to drive a truck with its tailgate up than down? Can sticking one's finger in a gun barrel stop a bullet?

programme.title: Mythbusters Revealed Special
programme.desc: The fans are in for a treat with this special episode which opens the archives to the best of the show’s bad takes, flubs and flops, many of which have never been screened before.

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 102
programme.desc: Myths tested: Is it possible to use a rowboat as a submarine? Can one escape if buried in the sand? What kind of projectiles would pirates use in a cannon if they run out of cannonballs?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 88
programme.desc: Myths tested: Do birds flying in a trailer cause the trailer to become lighter? Will a boat crashing into a channel marker cleave itself in half?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 152
programme.desc: Can duct tape be used to build a bridge? Can duct tape be used to fix a car? Can duct tape be used to hold a car in place? Can duct tape be used to stop a car going 60 miles per hour?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 219
programme.desc: Can a ping pong ball inflict a lethal injury if it flies fast enough? Can a cannon and cannonballs made from ice be a reliable weapon?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 33
programme.desc: Myths tested: Could using a phone in a thunderstorm result in being electrocuted? Could a bullet pass through a man's genitals, into a woman's abdomen and subsequently make the woman pregnant?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 225
programme.desc: When two cars try to knock each other off the road, does it always result in a difficult duel? Is the silver screen trick of tipping up on to two wheels and driving sideways as easy as it seems?

programme.title: MythBusters: Upfront Demolition Derby Special
programme.desc: When a bus is moving at over 50 miles per hour, will moving passengers to the inside of the turn keep the bus from flipping? Will a car dropped from 4,000 feet fall faster than a speeding car?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 153
programme.desc: Can a person be launched 115 feet into a kiddie pool from a giant waterslide? Can a mail delivery truck taking only right turns save gas?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 134
programme.desc: Is it possible to lift a car using nothing but duct tape? Can duct tape plug holes in the bottom of boats? Can you create a working sail-boat out of duct tape?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 106
programme.desc: Myths tested: Can a lead balloon fly? Is it possible to surf a wave caused by an explosion?

programme.title: MythBusters: Episode 213
programme.desc: If a single car brakes lightly, can it cause a ripple that triggers a major traffic jam? Is it better to stay in one lane in heavy traffic instead of changing lanes?

programme.title: Mythbusters+
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Kick back and enjoy the best of Black Hollywood through all your favorite urban series! Featuring reality shows and box office hit dramas, this channel is guaranteed to have everything you’ve been waiting for in one place.

programme.title: Run's House: Rapper's Retreat
programme.desc: Rev receives guest passes to the Mohegan Sun in Connecticut. Justine doesn't want to go. Rev is proud of Jojo's recent recordings with Blackout and wants to reward him as a fellow rapper.

channel.desc: Watch as Ryan and his team investigate disturbances and try to work out what these alleged paranormal phenomena really could be!

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Good Vs. Evil
programme.desc: PRS visits a western Pennsylvania couple wracked by a torrent of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Haunted Piano
programme.desc: Ryan and the PRS team are called in when unlucky antique collectors unwittingly bring a paranormally-infested piano into their home. The team attempts to dismantle and destroy the offending instrument.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Glove
programme.desc: When a terrifying haunting threatens to break a Daisytown, PA couple apart, PRS is their last resort. As the investigation deepens, PRS and the family learn that it's just the tip of iceberg, turns out this haunting might be all in the family.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Homecoming
programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.sub-title: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.desc: PRS returns to the site of one of their most famous cases, Daisytown, PA, where they had discovered a glove print of an old miner that they determined was the spirit of a Great-Grandfather.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Join Yvette Fielding and the team investigate paranormal happenings at some of the world's most haunted locations, all on their very own 24/7 Most Haunted channel!

programme.title: Most Haunted: Chambercombe Manor, Devon
programme.desc: The team travels a well-trodden road, and arrives once more in Devon to discover that country life isn't all that easygoing. This former family home hides a centuries-old secret of fatherly betrayal.

programme.title: Most Haunted: South Stack Lighthouse, Anglesey
programme.desc: Kicking off the ninth season, the "Most Haunted" team investigate South Stack Lighthouse, Anglesey, where untimely death, shipwrecks and isolation await them.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Boys Hall
programme.desc: Hidden treasure, a concealed corpse and visible phantoms await Yvette as she travels with her team to Kent to investigate Boys Hall, an outstanding example of Jacobean architecture.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Beaumaris Gaol
programme.desc: Local medium Michelle Taylor joins the team again as they investigate Beaumaris Gaol, a jail on the island of Anglesey. An innocent man who was hanged there is said to have cursed the church clock.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Brougham Hall
programme.desc: The checkered history of Brougham Hall in Cumbria provides a compelling backdrop for a ghostly family reunion in this paranormal investigation.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Alton Towers
programme.desc: The team visits Alton Towers and has a frightening brush with something more terrifying than the usual thrills and spills of the funfair.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Dartford Library
programme.desc: Dartford Library comes under Yvette and the crew's scrutiny as they experience strange poltergeist activity involving books, and contact the denizens that appear to cling to the building.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Stockport Workhouse
programme.desc: The Stockport Workhouse opened on a bleak Christmas Day in 1841 and quickly filled with the desperate and jobless. The Dickensian atmosphere gives Yvette and the team a night to remember!

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Park, Old Hall
programme.desc: Journalist Carol Thatcher joins the team as they journey to Tatton Old Hall. They investigate reports of a misogynistic presence as well as a mischievous spirit who plays tricks on the unwary.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Cammell Laird
programme.desc: Untimely death, fear and vast emptiness await the team in Merseyside. They investigate the offices and huge construction hall of what was once the heart of the Cammell Laird shipyard.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Sutton House
programme.desc: Musician and amateur ghost hunter Lee Ryan joins Yvette as the team encounter poltergeists, fear and phantoms at Sutton House. They find a veritable treasure trove of reported paranormal activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tatton Park Mansion
programme.desc: The crew investigates Tatton Park Mansion. There is so much reported paranormal activity within its walls that certain phantoms must walk the grounds because there is no room for them inside.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Matlock Bath Pavilion
programme.desc: The team travels to the spa town of Matlock Bath to investigate strange phenomena in the pavilion. Once a tourist destination, it is now home to a mining museum, a night club and ghostly apparitions.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hever Castle
programme.desc: The majestic location of Hever Castle in Kent is inextricably linked to the doomed relationship between King Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn. What regal phantoms will the investigation reveal?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Rasnov Citadel Night - Part One
programme.desc: Traveling deep into the heart of Romania to the Transylvanian mountains, the team experiences its most frightening investigation yet as it uncovers skeletons and ghosts perhaps best left alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Binge watch Highway To Heaven, the classic 80s fantasy drama, starring Michael Landon, an angel sent back to Earth to help people in need, right here on it’s very own channel!

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Child of God
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are on hand when a dying woman attempts a reconciliation with her estranged father. She is a single mother who wants her family to take the child.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Match Made in Heaven
programme.desc: Scotty is a lovelorn quadriplegic with a successful law practice. Jonathan is happy to play cupid, but Mark isn't so thrilled about it, because the woman in question is his cousin.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Banker and The Bum
programme.desc: A greedy banker and a good-hearted bum switch places. The bum dies, but the banker is now infused with love and generosity.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Brightest Star
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark meet a child star whose fame is spoiling her rotten, destroying her family and taking away her childhood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Investment In Caring
programme.desc: Jonathan encourages residents in a neighborhood to unite against a cold-hearted developer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Jonathan inspires a young man to help the grandfather who has recently been placed in a nursing home.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Thoroughbreds - Part 1
programme.desc: Lizzy MacGill is a horse trainer's young daughter who elopes with Garth Armstrong, a privileged man.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Thoroughbreds - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to help Lizzie. The new bride has cancer and she is pregnant.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 1
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan become counselors at a camp for children with cancer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are helping patients at Camp Good Times in different ways. But a father still refuses to deal with his son's illness.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Bless the Boys in Blue
programme.desc: Jonathan relinquishes his angelic powers for awhile and realizes the dangers that Mark has faced being a police officer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Cindy
programme.desc: An aspiring actress wants to be accepted for who she really is, not in the image her well-meaning dad tries to transform her into.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Devil and Jonathan Smith
programme.desc: Mark has been tricked into selling his soul in order to save a little girl's life. But the Devil has another agenda: acquiring Jonathan's soul.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Birds of a Feather
programme.desc: Factory workers ignore ground-water contamination, even though it is making their children sick. As a result, Jonathan takes drastic measures to force them to face the facts.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Wishing you could turn the clock back on your age? Then you’ve landed at the right place! 10 Years Younger is a reality series filled with makeovers, beauty advice and information about cosmetic techniques.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Rockin' Mom
programme.desc: Suddenly, Eva is a new wife and mother. This change in lifestyle has found her lazy and abandoning her once trendy and hip sense of style. Experts are waiting in the wings to refresh this weary mother.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Ronnie Donno
programme.desc: Teaching assistant Ronnie Donno already feels bad about the way she looks but before work can begin on getting her to look younger she has to hear how old 100 members of the public think she looks.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Runaway Ready
programme.desc: Joslyn modeled in college, and was a woman who always took care of the way she looked. After becoming a mother, the years of neglect have caught up to her. Will our experts be able to make Joslyn runway ready?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Saying "I Do" To A New Look
programme.sub-title: Saying "I Do" To A New Look
programme.desc: Maggie, a sassy gal from Scotland, is about to marry a man 13 years younger then her! This mother of two has found love, but doesn't want to look like she is the mom giving the groom away when she walks down the aisle. Our team is up for the challenge.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Scrubs No More
programme.desc: Darcey spends her days caring for three kids and her nights working as a nurse, with no time left for herself. Experts perform the latest procedures in dermatology and dentistry, and the glam squad takes her from scrubs to sass.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Self Conscious To Self Confident
programme.desc: Laura, a public speaker, has lost her self-confidence and is now only self-conscious. Once upbeat and bubbly, she suffered from an illness that took its toll on her appearance and self esteem. Can our experts help Laura regain her identity and a new look?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Serving Up a New Look
programme.desc: Dirk has been a busy restaurant owner for as long as he can remember. Long hours running three different establishments kept him from ever having time to take care of himself. Now, he's retired and ready to get on with life, but can't seem to get a date.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Sewing The Seeds To A New Look
programme.sub-title: Sewing The Seeds To A New Look
programme.desc: Melissa has the perfect Beverly Hills fashion career, working with the finest made-to-order clothing. But when the exclusive clientele see her missing teeth, the impression is not what she would like. She also desperately wants to update her look.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sharon Evans
programme.desc: 45 year old Welsh farmer Sharon Evans has so many animals to tend to that she's stopped looking after herself. Nicky Hambleton-Jones calls in the full cavalry on this one. Standby for one of the most breathtaking transformations of the series.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sharon Evans "One Year On"
programme.desc: Sharon Evans was one of the most breath-taking transformations of last series. Has Sharon managed to ditch the floral body warner forever or slipped back in to her old ways?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Sharyn O’Brien
programme.desc: With a wedding planned and a fiance waiting, primary school teacher Sharyn O'Brien is desperately in need of help. Can Fiona McDonald and her crack team of experts bin Sharyn's bad dye job and reinvent her in just 10 days?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: She’s Cookin’ Now!
programme.desc: Wendy is a house cleaner with bigger aspirations. A single mother for 15 years, Wendy recently remarried, and with a duel income, it's time for her to follow her dreams of becoming a professional chef. The only problem – her looks aren't exactly 5 Star.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Shirley Maddison
programme.desc: Shirley's lack of self confidence stems from her poor self image. She thinks she looks old. She's not the only one. A public poll guessed her age at 52. The time for serious intervention has arrived from Nicky Hambleton-Jones.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Shopping For a New Look
programme.desc: Karyn is a busy working wife and mother of three, whose current frumpy appearance isn't matching the way she feels inside. It's the goal of our experts to fashion Karyn a more youthful, trendsetting look as we try make her look 10 Years Younger.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Singing A New Tune
programme.desc: April lost a front tooth in a horseback riding accident and never smiles. Her passion is singing, and she'd like to stand on stage without embarrassment. Will an orthodontic overhaul and a full Glam assault drop years from her appearance?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Siobhan Wirdman
programme.desc: Step in Nicky Hambleton-Jones to rescue 37 year old Siobhan Wirdman and get this full time wife and mother to love herself and get her life back on track.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Sizing Down And Looking Up
programme.desc: Allison has battled with her weight her entire life, and although she's lost 70 pounds through hard work and exercise, she still feels incredibly self-conscious about her appearance. Allison avoids certain social situations because of her insecurity.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Sky Hag To Sky Hottie
programme.desc: Fourteen years of working as a flight attendant has taken its toll on Kelly's appearance. She is sick of being referred to as a "sky hag" by her younger colleagues, but she's not ready to hang up her wings.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Smokin’ Hot
programme.desc: After losing her mom at a young age, Fayleen took care of her younger siblings and the stress of tough times caused her to go gray at 18. Now she has her own family and Fayleen wants to look good for her children.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Soccer Mom to Soccer Bomb!
programme.desc: Colleen Radcliffe is a mother of four and says she doesn't have a spare second to spend on herself. Colleen feels like the old mom with no end in sight, but we're here to teach her that isn't the case. Time to make Colleen look 10 Years Younger!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Spinning a More Youthful Look
programme.desc: Evan is a mobile DJ who is trying to take his business to the next level. Evan hasn't had the time or money to take care his looks but he knows it's absolutely necessary now if his business is going to continue growing.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Standing Up To Her Past
programme.desc: Norma Jean is a single, working mother of two whom by night makes audiences laugh as a stand-up comic, but worries that her tired and worn down appearance may be what they're laughing at instead.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Starting Over
programme.desc: Elyse is a recently divorced mother of two, trying to start her new life. She has found it difficult to stay in shape, and feels stress, UV rays and time have caught up with her. Now ready to re-enter the dating game, our coaches help get her into shape.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sue Chamberlain
programme.desc: For the past 12 years Sue Chamberlain has been harbouring a devastating secret. She's entirely lost her confidence and her youth. Presenter Nicky Hambleton-Jones and a team of experts revive Sue's confidence.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sue Chamberlain "One Year On"
programme.desc: Just a year ago, Sue Chamberlain was a 34 year old living in a 40 year old's body. Now, a year on, we retrace Sue's transformational journey – and pop in to pay Sue a return visit. Will she still be looking fabulous – or flabby?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sue Tomkins
programme.desc: Night shift worker Sue Tomkins has lost her sparkle. Lank hair, haggard wrinkles, sunken eyes and weary clothes are just the starting point for Nicky Hambleton-Jones and her team of experts who've got 10 days to knock 10 years off Sue's lifeless look.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand
programme.desc: Everyone wants to look younger but if you work hard and play hard like Sue Whyte, it's far tougher to roll back those years. Sue's already stopped smoking and lost a lot of weight so can Fiona McDonald and her team of time warriors take care of the rest?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Wild at Heart, the feel good British family drama series, which sees Bristol Vet (Stephen Tompkinson) and his family emigrating to start a game park in South Africa. Watch it now 24/7!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: While on honeymoon in London, Alice discovers that Danny has some final business to do before they can return home to Africa. He's reluctantly arranged to meet his estranged father, Robert, who has recently got back in touch.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny is throwing himself into his work after the death of his father, and has applied for the role of State Vet. However, Danny's attempts to involve Thabo in the first phase of the Lion Breeding Project lead to Du Plessis feeling like an outsider.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: It is Danny's first day as State Vet and when he helps rescue some smuggled animals he feels he's making a difference. However, he discovers the role isn't going to be all plain sailing.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny's first big project as State Vet is a major animal translocation, and he is desperate to impress. Meanwhile, whilst Alice is out in the bush treating an injured zebra, she is stalked by lions. She makes it back to her jeep in time but is shaken up.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Alice is still suffering from a loss of nerve after her close shave with the lions and so Danny tries to help her overcome her problems – the Leopard's Den lions have produced their first cub and he needs Alice back in the saddle.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: In his role as State Vet, Danny works with wealthy conservationist, Anton Ziegler, to catch a group of leopard hunters. Ziegler is also buying a tiger from Vanessa, who struggling with her finances, desperately needs the money to ensure Mara's future.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: Du Plessis has started a one man campaign of vandalism against the new neighbours at Mara; Peeters and the mining company. When Peeters catches him on CCTV, Du Plessis is fined and given a restraining order to keep him away from Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Du Plessis comes to meet Caroline's plane but he doesn't seem happy – he has seen that the mining company have already started building the road which threatens Leopard's Den.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: The family are making arrangements to leave Leopard's Den, all except Du Plessis who is steadfastly refusing to accept that he has lost his home. He won't use his share of the money from the sale of the land to buy somewhere else.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: The family have been squatting at Leopard's Den as they prepare to make their last stand to prevent the bulldozers from destroying their home. Du Plessis and Fatani bring elephants and a giraffe to dissuade the construction crew from moving in.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: After the devastating loss of Leopard's Den, the family are split across continents. Caroline, Liv and a heavily pregnant Alice are in the UK, while Danny and Du Plessis have remained in South Africa.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny returns to South Africa with Caroline, Liv and Charlotte. They are all excited to be back and are looking forward to seeing their new home, Clearwater Farm.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Danny has been preparing his pitch for an Endangered Species Project. JLW, a pharmaceutical company, are looking to fund an environmental project and the family hope that this grant money will enable them to buy Leopard's Den and Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Ed release two cheetah brothers together, a symbol of their new partnership, but not all of the family are happy about this new start. Caroline is still furious at what she sees as Danny's betrayal of Du Plessis.

programme.title: Wild at Heart
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: So Real shows you fascinating and outrageous documentaries and series, bringing you the inside scoop on the heroic, weird and wonderful.

programme.title: Big Families: Price and Prejudice
programme.desc: Our first family are determined not to take government handouts. Dad works, mum stays at home and does the odd job and they budget to stay afloat. In their opinion, it was their choice to have 12 children so it's their responsibility to look after them.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 12
programme.desc: Building site manager Lee Thomas-Wilcox and International development expert Trevor Nott are about to find out what it's like to be mum for three days.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 13
programme.desc: Fireman Mark and Pool Hall Owner Geoff are about to discover what life is like when Mum goes on strike.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 14
programme.desc: Taxi-driver Steve and part-time DJ Dave are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their worn-out wives Jane and Gemma have gone on strike and are spending 3 days at a luxury spa.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 15
programme.desc: Businessmen Neil and Bob are about to take on the toughest job of their lives. Their worn-out wives Alison and Karen have gone on strike and are spending 3 days at a luxury spa.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 16
programme.desc: What happens when two hard working mums down tools and go on strike for three days, leaving their homes and children in the hands of their husbands?

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 17
programme.desc: What will happen when two dads are left on their own to run the family? What will mum think of Dad's efforts whilst she watches from the comfort of a five star luxury hotel suite!

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 18
programme.desc: Mark makes pizza for a teenage sleepover, whilst Martin tumble-dries son FK's bibs – which disastrous results.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 19
programme.desc: Hard working mums Gillian and Sandra are going on strike for three days leaving the home and he children in the hands of their husbands Ken and Joe.

programme.title: I Want My Mummy!: Episode 20
programme.desc: Don struggles to get to grips with a dinner of custard and mozzerella, whilst Ian's meal of burnt nuggets and charred chips is even worse.

programme.title: Tearaway Teen To Beauty Queen: Episode 1
programme.desc: 9 tearaway teens swap hoodies for high heels to battle for a place at a major US teen pageant. First, can beauty queen mentor Michelle Fryatt handle the tears and tantrums when the girls reject a dramatic makeover?

programme.title: Tearaway Teen To Beauty Queen: Episode 2
programme.desc: 8 tearaway teenagers hope to become Miss Teen England International. Their next challenge? Championing a good cause. But after a week's swearing and scrapping can the turbulent teens pull off a convincing speech when put to the test?

programme.title: Tearaway Teen To Beauty Queen: Episode 3
programme.desc: Behaving like a beauty queen proves a tough challenge for the 7 remaining tearaway teens. Mentor Michelle Fryatt expects grace both on and off the catwalk, but shocking bullying and bitching leads to the most explosive elimination yet.

programme.title: Tearaway Teen To Beauty Queen: Episode 4
programme.desc: The 6 remaining wannabe beauty queens face their toughest challenge yet – a full-blown pageant in Manchester. But with stress and stage fright causing explosive outbursts and tearful meltdowns, which three can Michelle risk taking to America as finalists?

programme.title: Tearaway Teen To Beauty Queen: Episode 5
programme.desc: Beauty queen Michelle Fryatt challenges the three remaining teens to survive the media spot light as celebrities – but she didn't mean late night parties and boozing. So will bad behaviour play a part at the elimination in Chicago?

programme.title: Tearaway Teen To Beauty Queen: Episode 6
programme.desc: Beauty Queen Michelle decides which teen deserves to be Miss Teen England. But can her chosen tearaway conquer the US teen professionals and bring home the crown for England at the pageant? Prepare for tears and tantrums...

programme.title: Undercover Princes And Princesses
programme.desc: This is the hilarious and compelling compilation programme showing what happened when three Princes and then three Princesses came over to the UK looking for love. To ensure their mission was a success they went undercover as every day men and women.

programme.title: So Real
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Motorvision is dedicated to the motor enthusiast, whether it’s adventure, off-road or for the urban jungle, we showcase the best in motoring from around the world.

programme.title: Classic Races: German Touring Championship 1992
programme.desc: The 1992 German Touring Car Championship is one of the most important racing series in German motorsport for sure. It's hard, merciless and well known for its die-hard battles between the ruthless competitors.

programme.title: Classic Races: Touring Car Grand Prix, Argentina 1964
programme.desc: Tropical temperatures, never-ending dust and curves: those are just some of the many difficulties for man and machine during the 1964 Grand Prix in Argentina. This race was responsible for taking the Mercedes brand to the top.

programme.title: Classic Races: Indy 500 1994
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the world's most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesn't fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races: German Rallye Championship 1983
programme.desc: The German rally championship is one of the most popular motorsport series and has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races: Quattro The New Dimension 1985
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. Thats why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro. And with it began a new dimension.

programme.title: Classic Races: The Rallye World Championship 1982
programme.desc: The African continent is always a difficult terrain for rally drivers. That wasn't any different for the 1982 World Rally Championship, when heat, dust, mud and hardly passable routes posed major challenges for drivers, co-drivers and engines.

programme.title: Classic Races: Mercedes Races Again 1954/55
programme.desc: In 1954, after more than 20 years of abstinence, Mercedes returns to Grand Prix racing. With a lot of engagement, advanced engineering and with the best Grand-Prix-drivers of the world, Mercedes wanted to enjoy success in motorsports again.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Amphicar
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 is a rare classic. Its special attraction is that you drive motorboat on the road. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it’s ready to be used on the water as well.

programme.title: Classic Ride: MG TC
programme.desc: The MG TC is a sporty, but also extremely spartan car with technology from the late 1940s. Thus the car might be somewhat susceptible to technical problems, but it’s very easy to maintain.

programme.title: Classic Ride: BMW 319
programme.desc: The BMW 319/1 is one of the rarest and most demanded pre-war classic cars from Germany. Only 178 of them were ever built. Nowadays a well-maintained BMW 319/1 costs more than a Ferrari.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Ron William's Cadillac
programme.desc: The 1952 Cadillac Fleetwood is also known as the American Rolls-Royce, because it’s the car of celebrities, presidents, millionaires and mafia bosses. Only around 16,000 units were built, so it’s a treasured collector’s piece.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Jaguar E-Type
programme.desc: A legend celebrates its 50th anniversary. In 1961 The Jaguar E-Type was shown for the first time on the Motor Show Geneva.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Mercedes 300 SL Gullwing
programme.desc: The Mercedes 300SL might be the most exciting sports car of the post-war era. A panel of judges even named it the sports car of the century. Hans Kleissl from Polling near Munich owns one of the world's leading repair and restoration shops.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 70s it was the fastest and most sportive production sports car in Germany: the Porsche Carrera RS. Today the RS is a classic Porsche with the highest acclaim.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Ron Williams and his Cougar
programme.desc: After the sensational success of the 1964 presented Ford Mustang, the Ford Motor Company decided to build another exciting car, based on the Mustang, the Mercury Cougar.

programme.title: Classic Ride: DeLorean
programme.desc: It is one of the most spectacular cars of the last 30 years: the Delorean DMC-12. But after 9000 built cars, the production came to an end in 1982.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Melkus
programme.desc: Revisiting the past to portray the classic and veteran cars of decades gone by, meeting the personalities who wrote automotive history, sending very old cars running round very fast circuits.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Audi S1 Quattro, Part 1
programme.desc: It's the most powerful and most spectacular rally car ever built: The Audi Sport quattro S1. Based on the regular Audi Sport Quattro, the S1 is 32 cm shorter, has giant wings and spreads anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Audi S1 Quattro, Part 2
programme.desc: It is sexy, spectacular and comes with tremendous speed: the Audi Sport quattro S1, the most exciting rally car ever built. In part 2 of the S1 special, Classic Rides accompanies S1 pilot Michael Gerber during the second day of the Rally Legend.

programme.title: Classic Ride: Alfa Romeo
programme.desc: Alfa Romeo, even nowadays the paragon of design, Italian car making and car racing. But from the official racing Alfa Romeo departed long ago.

programme.title: Go Green: Opel Ampera
programme.desc: The Opel Ampera is the first electric family saloon that is designed to convince anyone that¿s wary of electric cars. After its introduction at the 2011 Geneva Motor Show, the mid-range car is now available for sale.

programme.title: Go Green: Green, Greener, Greenest
programme.desc: Green, greener, greenest ... the market for alternative power sources just keeps growing, and that won't stop. Practically every automobile manufacturer has developed an electric car or a hybrid model vehicle.

programme.title: Go Green: International Motor Show Frankfurt
programme.desc: The market for alternative drive technologies just keeps growing and the best place to present the newest cars is at the biggest car show in the world, - the IAA, in Frankfurt, Germany.

programme.title: Go Green: Volvo C30
programme.desc: The Volvo C30 electric is a purely electric car without combustion engine or range extender. Since 2010 the Swedish company works on their concept to realize pure electric driving.

programme.title: Go Green: Lexus RX 450 h
programme.desc: The Lexus RX 450h is the second revised hybrid model coming from the Toyota Group. Go Green checks out the full hybrid SUV. Plus: The young car manufactory Artega emphasizes the importance of ecologically sensitive sports cars.

programme.title: Go Green: Audi A1 E-Tron
programme.desc: At first glance, the Audi A1 on this episode of Go Green seems to be an ordinary small city car, but it’s actually quote special. It’s driving almost without any emission. Plus: Spectacular design, unusual proportions and innovative ideas.

programme.title: Go Green: Tokyo Motor Show Concepts
programme.desc: After the Tsunami and Fukushima - This years Tokyo Motor Show will promote both optimism and fun. The highlights: Mercedes brought the study of the hydrogen-powered F125 to the 'Land of the Rising Sun'.

programme.title: Motorvision TV
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Pluto TV Series brings the drama straight to wherever you are, from classic shows, award winning series and hidden gems!

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Wrath of Achilles
programme.desc: The resistance releases a virus of Augur on the Taelon headquarters in Washington. Things get out of hand.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: While a dying colonel implants his brain in a deceased criminal, the Taelons show a new electromagnetic pulse weapon. Jonathan Doors wishes to acquire it.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Law and Order
programme.desc: The Synod agrees to let Rho'ha be charged with murder in a human court. He will be prosecuted by Joshua Doors, the son of Jonathan Doors.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: A new inter-dimensional portal system for human travel turns out to be something more when the resistance discover a CVI in a boy who got lost in the system.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Infection
programme.desc: Ne'eg is killed by a bacteria that is both deadly to Taelons and Humans. If it spreads, it might be disastrous. A new racist group attacks a community center.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Destruction
programme.desc: The Liberation sends a team to destroy the scarecrow probe before the Taelons crack it. Joshua Doors is appointed as secretary of Human-Taelon relations.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Joining
programme.desc: An excavation team unleashes a very dangerous Taelon on Earth. Siobhan Beckett comes over to America. She suspects Lili of being a spy and investigates.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First of its Kind
programme.desc: Following Boone's confrontation with Hegel that left him severely injured, he was eliminated by Zo'or. Beckett who was impregnated by Hegel gives birth to a boy who immediately grows up to a man.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Avatus
programme.desc: Da'an looses his contact with the the Taelon Commonality. This causes him to change and Zo'or instructs that Da'an must be killed; because he's now considered a threat.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Stitch in Time
programme.desc: An exhibition for the first arrival of the Taelons showcases different artifacts. An artifact causes Liam to travel to an alternate time. Zo'or questions how Da'an was able to rejoin the Commonality.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dimensions
programme.desc: Liam and Augur are in a Taelon shuttle craft, when something happens they get thrown into a parallel universe. They discover that humanity is at war with the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Moonscape
programme.desc: Augur is forced to take part in a Taelon experiment. Da'an and Liam try to convince Zo'or that altering minds and implanting humans to make them aggressive to fight the Jaridians is not the correct path. Maiya makes contact with Sandoval.

programme.title: The Alice: Episode 10
programme.desc: When a strange wind blows into town, Jack fears he has lost his cool and embarks on a search through the desert.

programme.title: The Alice: Episode 11
programme.desc: Matt is in for a culture shock when he and Jess visit a local community and meet a patient who has been diagnosed with water snakes in the belly.

programme.title: The Alice: Episode 12
programme.desc: Helen invites Jack to dinner, sending him into a tailspin: what if dinner means more than just dinner?

programme.title: Shades Of Love: The Scandal
programme.desc: Based on Rosamunde Pilcher's acclaimed romance novels and boasting a prestigious British cast including Charles Dance.

programme.title: Pluto TV Series
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: PokerGo is our brand new 24/7 channel dedicated to all things poker. Here you can find all the top pros competing in the most prestigious series held around the world.

programme.title: 2020 Australian Poker Open: Event #07
programme.desc: Relive the Main Event, Event #7: AU$100,000 No-Limit Hold'em final table from the 2020 Australian Poker Open. Watch Michael Addamo, Aaron Van Blarcum, Alex Foxen, Stephen Chidwick, and Kahle Burns play for the AU$1,288,000 first-place prize.

programme.title: 2020 Hindsight: Episode 1
programme.desc: Matt Berkey delivers new, hard-hitting analysis on the hands that defined the 2010 World Series of Poker Main Event. Watch Michael Mizrachi, Joseph Cheong, John Racener, and eventual champion Jonathan Duhamel on the debut episode now.

programme.title: 2020 Hindsight: Episode 2
programme.desc: Matt Berkey delivers new, hard-hitting analysis on the hands that defined the 2003 World Series of Poker Main Event. Watch Sammy Farha, Dan Harrington, and eventual champion Chris Moneymaker on 2020 Hindsight.

programme.title: 2020 Hindsight: Episode 3
programme.desc: Matt Berkey delivers new, hard-hitting analysis on the hands that defined the 2016 World Series of Poker Main Event. Watch Cliff Josephy, Gordon Vayo, Kenny Hallaert, and eventual champion Qui Nguyen on 2020 Hindsight.

programme.title: 2020 Hindsight: Episode 4
programme.desc: Matt Berkey delivers new, hard-hitting analysis on the hands that defined the 2009 World Series of Poker Main Event. Watch Phil Ivey, Darvin Moon, and eventual champion Joe Cada on 2020 Hindsight.

programme.title: 2020 Hindsight: Episode 5
programme.desc: Matt Berkey delivers new, hard-hitting analysis on the hands that defined the 2004 World Series of Poker Main Event. Watch David Williams, Dan Harrington, and eventual champion Greg Raymer on 2020 Hindsight.

programme.title: 2020 Hindsight: Episode 6
programme.desc: Matt Berkey delivers new, hard-hitting analysis on the hands that defined the 2012 World Series of Poker Main Event. Watch Jesse Sylvia, Jeremy Ausmus, and eventual champion Greg Merson on 2020 Hindsight.

programme.title: Dolly's Game: $100K 2-7 NL - Day 1
programme.desc: Relive the biggest hands from the 2-7 NL Single Draw debut of "Dolly's Game" with Doyle Brunson, John Monnette, Billy Baxter, Shawn Sheikhan, and Majid Yahyaei. Ali Nejad and Randy Ohel call the $100,000 buy-in action.

programme.title: Dolly's Game: $100K 2-7 NL - Day 2
programme.desc: Old school legends meet on PokerGO's newest show. Relive the 2-7 NL Single Draw action and Day 2 of the "Dolly's Game" debut with Doyle Brunson, John Monnette, Billy Baxter, Shawn Sheikhan, and Majid Yahyaei now.
