channel.desc: Joe Kenda has solved 387 homicide investigations, with a 92% solve rate. Each episode of Homicide Hunter uses Kenda’s first person narrative along with dramatic re-creations to retell the stores of his most disturbing and challenging murder cases.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Where is Claudia Jane
programme.desc: 15-year old CJ Bates is reported missing, and Kenda must investigate the mysterious circumstances behind disappearance of the teenager.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lockdown
programme.desc: When a crazed gunman terrorizes his neighborhood, officers put themselves in the line of fire to restore order.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Time Bomb
programme.desc: In 1978, Lt. Joe Kenda is new to the CSPD, and gets more than he bargains for when a local bank is the target of a massive explosion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Body in the Freezer
programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the “victim” could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Timothy Peart’s Last Dance
programme.desc: When a teen is killed at a party, police question the guests and wonder if they’re all part of a cover-up.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eyes of a Child
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: I Will Hunt You Down
programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Gut Instinct
programme.desc: When a soon-to-be grandmother doesn’t come home from work and the investigation unfolds, Lt. Joe Kenda realizes they could be dealing with a fledgling serial killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Joker In the Pack
programme.desc: A card game is interrupted by gunfire, leaving a young man dead. Lt. Joe Kenda soon learns the seeds of his destruction were sewn earlier the same day.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bring My Baby Home
programme.desc: A four-week-old girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her. Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she’s been sold on the black market… or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: When mother of two Shaundra Murr is run over in front of her house, officers initially suspect a hit and run. Until Lt. Joe Kenda uncovers evidence proving Shaundra’s murder was a crime of passion.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Preying on the Innocent
programme.desc: When the son of a prominent politician is murdered in his basement, Lt. Joe Kenda feels pressure from City Hall to solve the case.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My, My, Merry Christmas
programme.desc: Donald Ott is found shot to death, friends tell police he didn’t have an enemy in the world. But when Lt. Joe Kenda speaks with family, he learns of a relative who might hold the key to the mystery.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Cesar Millan is one of the most renowned and sought-after experts working in the field of dog training. This is not just a series about dog training, it’s people training for dogs. Each episode tackles real-life problems faced by dog owners everywhere.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bam Bam
programme.desc: Cesar is called in to help a Pit Bull outgrow his puppy ways. A Chihuahua Mix terrorizes an older Mastiff and dominates the rest of the house. Cesar is called in to restore the balance of power.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Harry & Brooks
programme.desc: Harry wants to charge after anything with wheels, including passing cyclists, rollerbladers or skateboarders. Brooks, an Entlebucher, is constantly chasing after light, he is never calm.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Playboy Playmates
programme.desc: The Playboy Mansion in sunny Los Angeles is famous for raucous parties but it’s also home to Playboy founder, Hugh Hefner, some of his Playmates, and their dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bikini, Fella, Winston and Oliver
programme.desc: Bull terrier won't behave at home and has irrational fear of grooming; Jack Russell / Italian Greyhound mix cries and barks whenever left alone; a police officer's Yorkies are disturbing the peace.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Teenage Savior
programme.desc: Over 2,000 people gathered at a local PETCO in hopes of a session with Cesar. This episode follows two of these troubled canines. Things get serious when Cesar's son joins in to help.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Stewart & Buddy
programme.desc: Stewart, a Chow/Golden Retriever mix, barks and growls at and seems to be fearful and aggressive toward children. Every time Johnny turns on the hose, Buddy the Beagle runs for the house.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: A Dog and his Boy; Mobile Vet
programme.sub-title: A Dog and his Boy; Mobile Vet
programme.desc: Vet Dr. Rick Garcia, needs Cesar’s help with some high maintenance patients. An 11 month old Siberian Husky must learn how to be a member of the family.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bad Dogs of Comedy
programme.desc: A pet groomer gets rave reviews but needs Cesar's help with handling some difficult clients. Chihuahua Peanut is only 10 pounds but makes a good bit of noise, causing chaos with her cohabiters.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar Down Under
programme.sub-title: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar Down Under
programme.desc: Paul Watson can't stop his great Dane, from biting at him. Andrea and Adrian avoid taking their Bearded Collie to the dog park because of her. Cesar travels down under to tame them.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Tenacious B
programme.desc: A French Bulldog is anxious around other dogs, and a Vizsla is afraid of cars. Can Cesar help one dog improve his social skills and steer the other's behavior toward the fast lane?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Homeboys and Hounds
programme.desc: Cesar helps two former gang members through Homeboy Industries, an outreach program designed to break the cycle of gang violence but who have problem dogs at home.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Desperate Housedogs
programme.desc: Three Huskies are out of control on walks; a Labrador puppy chews on everything; a Spaniel/Mastiff mix snaps at other dogs; and three German shepherds bully other dogs. Cesar! Help!

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Sunshine & Teddy
programme.desc: Sunshine is a champion Doberman in the show ring but far too aggressive in the street. Teddy, a yellow lab, has bitten its owner twice, and has attacked more than one stranger.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hank & Paris
programme.desc: Marsha Alexander’s rescued Mastiff has ruined the furniture and intimidates anyone walking by his gate. Paris, a long hair Chihuahua, looks fashionable, but barks and snaps at strangers.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Not So Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A Border Collie is overly protective of her owner, nipping at anyone who comes near her. A Police Officer rescued a German shepherd, who is people and dog aggressive and always ready for a fight.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Chihuahuas from Hell
programme.desc: This one-hour special highlights the demonic demeanors of one of the most challenging breeds, Chihuahuas. Cesar revisits the stories of past participants, Paris, Bandit, and NuNu amongst others.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: My Strange Addiction tells the stories of people who are battling obsessive behaviors. From eating toilet paper to a woman who sleeps with her blow dryer, follow these addicts and meet with experts in an attempt to understand their strange fixation.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: This Little Piggy_All Dolled Up
programme.desc: Sharon’s collection of pig items has exceeded 6,000 and adorns almost every square inch of her home. Rebecca’s obsession with Barbie dolls includes styling her own hair and wardrobe to match her dolls.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Justin Bieber Look-a-like/Makeup Eater
programme.desc: Toby, a 33-year-old man who's spent over $100,000 on surgery to look like Justin Bieber and 22-year-old Brittoni, who's addicted to eating makeup.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Bricks / Married To A Carnival Ride
programme.sub-title: Eats Bricks / Married To A Carnival Ride
programme.desc: For the past three years, 56-year-old Linda has been happily married to Bruce, a 70-foot carnival ride. Patrice is also happily married and showcases her addiction for eating brick.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to Being Pamela Anderson
programme.desc: Carolyn Anderson, a 29 year-old women from the UK, is addicted to transforming herself into Baywatch beauty Pamela Anderson.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Air Freshener / Long Neck
programme.desc: In this episode we meet Evelyn, who drinks air freshener every day, and Sydney, who is obsessed with having the world's longest neck.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Older Women/ Madonna
programme.desc: 31-year-old Kyle is addicted to dating much older women, over the age of 65. Adam is intent upon becoming Madonna.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: My Strange Addiction Special 3
programme.desc: In this special episode of My Strange Addiction, we count down the ten most shocking addictions ever featured on the series and provide updates.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Extreme Cycling/Taxidermy
programme.desc: Tom is so addicted to cycling that he spends at least six hours a day riding. Divya loves spending her time searching for dead animals on the side of the road and stuffing them.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Rocks/Pillow Obsessed
programme.desc: Theresa has been eating rocks for more than 20 years and can't stop. Meanwhile, Tamara carries around her childhood pillow Boo everywhere she goes.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Bathes in Bleach/Eats Plastic
programme.desc: Kailyn has eaten plastic every day for more than eleven years, consuming more than 150 pounds. Meanwhile, Gloria, 28, has taken her addiction to bleach to the extreme by bathing in it daily.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Carrying My Husband’s Urn
programme.desc: Casie has been so shocked by the sudden death of her husband, Shawn, that she takes his urn everywhere she goes. But she has now started eating his ashes.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Cat Food/Smells Moth Balls
programme.desc: Mary has taken her addiction to cat food to the extreme, consuming 900 cat treats and several cans of food every day. Meanwhile, Alicia has been addicted to smelling mothballs for 15 years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Sniffs Pine Cleaner/Road Kill Addict
programme.desc: Jillian is addicted to smelling pine cleaner and can't go more than 15 minutes without a fix, using up to six bottles a week. Scott is obsessed with picking up dead animals from the road.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Drinks Urine
programme.desc: Carrie has been addicted to drinking her urine for four years. She drinks about 80 ounces a day with belief it has helped treat her cancer. Can Carrie's daughters persuade her to see a physician?

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Drinks Gasoline / Carries Doll Head
programme.desc: Shannon is addicted to gasoline, drinking about 15 teaspoons every day. Lacey has been carrying and smelling her doll head "Suzie Q" everywhere she goes.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: In Love With Balloons/Face Mask Eater
programme.sub-title: In Love With Balloons/Face Mask Eater
programme.desc: Julius has been sexually attracted to balloons for decades and keeps more than fifty thousand in his home at all times. Natasha eats entire jars of clay face masks every day.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Blood Drinker
programme.desc: 29-year-old Michelle has been addicted to drinking blood, both human and pig, for the past 15 years. Her good friend is terrified Michelle is risking her life for her addiction.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Loves Baby Wipes/Eats Sand
programme.desc: Riah has been addicted to baby wipes since she was 15 and goes through up to 500 every day. Brea has been addicted to eating sand for the past 5 years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Vapor Rubs/Eats Tires
programme.desc: Danielle has been addicted to vapor rub for more than twenty years, going through more than 30 jars, inhalers and patches every week. Allison has been eating tires for the past six years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: The Lamb/Eats Deodorant
programme.desc: Nicole has been addicted to eating deodorant for two years, consuming fifteen sticks per month. 27-year-old Audrey can't live without her stuffed lamb.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint
programme.sub-title: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint
programme.desc: For the past 20 years, Nicole has been addicted to Pony Play. Meanwhile, 43-year-old single mother of two Heather has been addicted to drinking paint for nearly three years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Proud to be Plastic
programme.desc: Lacey, a 44-year-old mother of six has had at least 30 plastic surgery procedures and spent more than $250,000 building the most extreme body in the world.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Chews Dirty Diapers / Addicted to Leeches
programme.sub-title: Chews Dirty Diapers / Addicted to Leeches
programme.desc: 22-year-old Keyshia is addicted to chewing on urine-soaked diapers. Vladimir, a 50-year-old man, who uses leeches up to 40 times a year.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Drywall/Shower Drain Hair Collector
programme.desc: Evan has spent the last six years sneaking into bathrooms because he is addicted to collecting shower drain hair. And Nicole, has spent the last seven years secretly eating drywall.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: House of Dolls_Flashback to the 50's
programme.desc: Bob and Lizzie share their home with over 250 love dolls, and love to flaunt their collection around town. Doris Mayday is in her 20’s and stuck in the 50’s. Everything about Doris is from 1950.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to Inflatables/Butt Injection Addict
programme.desc: Mark has been addicted to his 15 inflatable pool toys, eating with them, sleeping with them and even bathing them. Karmello has been getting black market butt injections for the last three years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: From Hawaii to Alaska, to the swampy Bayou, each episode sees house hunters check out three unique properties from top to bottom, weigh the pros and cons of each place, then decide which one meets their needs, budget, and extreme home dreams!

programme.title: Buying Alaska: No Roads In
programme.desc: Dave and Wendy want a remote cabin where they can escape to the Alaskan frontier way of life, places so hidden that the only way there is by off-road vehicle and no outhouse is safe from hungry bears.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Jaws, Claws & Beaver Fever
programme.desc: Shane and Erica want a home in the Alaskan wild, where it’s so remote, the only way in is by a monster 8-wheeler. Homeowners beware! Bears attack the properties and beavers infect the drinking water.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hot Tubs and Gators
programme.desc: Duck, Lathan, & Flip are tired of traveling each weekend to their favorite place to enjoy bayou living. They’re willing to do anything to buy a home if they can hunt gators right out their back door.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Lakes for the Champ
programme.desc: “Catfish” Jack Clampit and his daughter, Amanda, love hand-grabbing catfish, so he and Amanda are searching for a camp that will accommodate both their families…and their appetite for catfish.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Starter Homes
programme.desc: Josh McIntire is an avid duck hunter and fisherman and he hopes to find a house where he can do just that. He’s bringing his life-long best friend, Hanna, for guidance.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Rolling on the River
programme.desc: Bryan Fassbender and Stephanie Robichaux are self described work-a-holics who just want to have a weekend houseboat on the Pearl River, and are willing to live off the grid.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Boaters Beware
programme.desc: Matt and Laurie aren’t your ordinary couple looking for a turnkey home. They love fixing places up. They look at three unusual homes on Louisiana oxbows.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Storm Deals
programme.desc: David and Jackie love bayou life in Mississippi. With their two sons away at college, they’re looking to downsize on the water. They’re looking for a fixer upper they can make their own.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hurricane Homes
programme.desc: Jeff and Amelia Harding cruise the Mississippi Gulf Coast in search of a new house. Amelia lost her home in Katrina, so they’re scouring the coast for a house that can stand up to a hurricane.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Beaches vs. Bayous
programme.desc: CJ, who grew up on a shrimp boat in Louisiana, and Marty, from Los Angeles, are looking for a weekend getaway but can’t agree whether it will be on the bayou or the beach.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Airboat Homes
programme.desc: They’re big, loud, fast and can traverse anything. Airboats aren’t just a novelty in Louisiana, they’re essential—join the Fradellas as they search for an airboat accessible home.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Louisiana Luxury
programme.desc: Larry and Amber Douglas started a business that has become a million-dollar operation. They’re looking to upgrade their lifestyle, but still want a place with a down home bayou feel.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cruisin For A Bruisin
programme.desc: Join Jill and Marvin as they comb Belle River for the perfect floating home—something that’ll get them back in the swamps and back to their bayou roots.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Bayou Baby
programme.desc: Chris and Jessica are going back to their roots and looking for a bayou home near Houma, Louisiana. But with a rambunctious baby, finding the perfect waterfront home can be a challenge.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cajun Bahamas
programme.desc: Mike Mazac and Kim Francis look for a Cajun camp where they can throw down and have a good ol’ time. Join these two as they cross lakes, navigate Bayous and motor through the Cajun Bahamas!

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Gumbo Shacks
programme.desc: Chef Brent Duthu and his father Danny are looking for a camp where they can catch speckled trout, one of South Louisiana’s delicacies right in their backyard.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Gator Country
programme.desc: T-Mike and Cayla want a new bayou home with enough room for their 300 pound pet pig. They need a place with water and a fence strong enough to hold this giant porker when he’s hot for a mate.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Fishing For A Bargain
programme.desc: Best friends, Drew and Nikki, are hopping aboard a boat and hitting the waterways looking for the ultimate fishing camp. But with floods and dangerous animals, the search can be a challenge.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Huntin' For A Bargain
programme.desc: James and Jennifer and their two kids raise Catahoula Cur hunting dogs in Northeast Lousiana. With 35 dogs, but only a half acre of land, they’re going to need a bigger home with space for the dogs.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Million Dollar Manor
programme.desc: Born and raised in the bayou, Floyd and Robin Foti are living the American Dream. Their small business grew to become a massive food market. Now they’re looking for a million dollar home.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: All-Terrain Livin
programme.desc: Josh and Tiffany Chambless grew up living the bayou lifestyle and spending any spare moment exploring the swamps on their ATVs. Now, they’re looking for a place that’s baby friendly.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Wake Zone Getaway
programme.desc: Ross and Sarah want a new bayou home where they can walk out their front door onto their fishing boat. They discover a house on an island can make getting there tough.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cajun Cabins
programme.desc: Pat and Joyce want their own slice of the southern frontier. They're looking for a hunting cabin that has the wilderness he wants, but the space she desires.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Redneck Riviera
programme.desc: Spear fisherman Clay and his girlfriend Jackie are looking for their first home together around Pensacola, Florida, an area where the bayou meets the beach, known as the Redneck Riviera.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Mississippi High Rises
programme.desc: Matthew and Lindsey are looking for a camp of their own. Lake Mary houses can flood, so the couple is looking for a high rise home, lifted 20 feet off the ground!

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Backwoods Paradise
programme.desc: Life in the bayou is all about family and passing down traditions. Blane is looking for a place where he can spend quality time with his teenage daughter, doing what their family does best – hunting.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Beached, Bayous, Backwoods
programme.desc: Jamie and his fiancée Brandi are looking for a home to start their life together near Gulf Shores, Alabama. But there’s one problem – Jamie wants a house on the bayou, but Brandi prefers the beach.

programme.title: Extreme American Homes
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: On a Los Angeles beach, a team of lifeguards led by Lieutenant Mitch Buchannon saves lives, deals with personal tragedies, fights crime, and participates in extraordinary adventures every day.

programme.title: Baywatch: Water Dance
programme.desc: Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: Baywatch: Wave Rage
programme.desc: After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Baywatch: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Baywatch: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sand castles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiancée, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitch’s son Hobie.

programme.title: Baywatch: In Deep
programme.desc: Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.title: Baywatch: Heat Wave
programme.desc: During the hottest day of the summer, Craig has to choose between his career as a lawyer and the job he loves being a Baywatch lifeguard. The choice is made when two boys get trapped in a storm drain which is rapidly filling with water.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Second Wave
programme.desc: Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.

programme.title: Baywatch: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unraveling whether his death was an accidental drowning or murder.

programme.title: Baywatch: Rookie School
programme.desc: While housesitting for Craig and Gina, Eddie takes in a runaway whose life is threatened by her mobster boyfriend. Meanwhile, Trevor enters Baywatch rookie school to become a certified LA County lifeguard.

programme.title: Baywatch: Cruise Ship
programme.desc: Eddie warns Shauni that her new boyfriend Andrew is not a good guy. She ignores Eddie until Andrew gives her a black eye. Meanwhile, Craig and Mitch must stop an out of control party boat before it crashes into the crowded Santa Monica pier.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Set in the glamorous world of the Los Angeles fashion scene, this soap opera focuses on the wealthy and powerful Forrester family. Its company, Forrester Creations, is the leader in the global fashion industry.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8000
programme.desc: Episode 8,000 is classic Bold and Beautiful drama. The story arc centers around an event so profound, it sends shockwaves throughout the lives of the Forresters, Spencers, Avants, Spectras, and Logans.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8001
programme.desc: Brooke, Ridge, and Bill land on Catalina Island behind Liam, excited to meet Beth. Hope and Brooke are overcome with emotion over Hope’s daughter.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8002
programme.desc: Shaken by what transpired on Catalina Island, Reese agrees to the thug’s demands. Brooke gives Ridge valuable step-parenting advice regarding Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8003
programme.desc: Eric and Quinn host a family gathering at the Forrester estate. Reese receives another threatening text with a specific image of Zoe attached.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8004
programme.desc: Brooke and Taylor set their differences aside and come together for the sake of their families. Taylor offers Reese companionship and advice to help him with his troubles.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8005
programme.desc: As Ridge and Bill review their tumultuous history, Brooke makes her allegiance known. Reese tells Taylor he wants to show her how much he cares about her.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8006
programme.desc: A woman from Reese’s past, Florence, introduces herself to Taylor. Liam spends time with Steffy and baby Kelly, vowing to always be present for them.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8007
programme.desc: The history between Reese and Florence comes to light when he asks her for a considerable favor. Taylor presents Steffy with an opportunity that she’s always wanted.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8008
programme.desc: Will impresses Dollar Bill with his talent for turning a profit before turning their conversation to the status of their family. Steffy becomes convinced that Taylor’s plan will change all of their lives for the better.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8009
programme.desc: When Wyatt and Sally visit Hope and Liam, Wyatt and Hope share a memory from their past. Impressed by Bill’s role in Will’s life, Katie convinces Thorne to allow Bill to stay for dinner.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8010
programme.desc: Thorne begins to feel left out watching Bill, Katie and Will spend family time together. In an attempt to bring them closer together, Sally gives Hope a very special gift.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8011
programme.desc: Watching Bill and Katie spend time together reminds Thorne of his special connection to Darla. Liam and Hope struggle as they realize the enormity of their loss.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8012
programme.desc: Flo becomes conflicted when she finds evidence that Reese is using her for his own agenda. Steffy considers adoption as Hope continues to grieve for Beth.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8013
programme.desc: Wyatt proves to Liam that he has his back and questions the motive for Steffy’s action. Reese justifies his scheme to Flo, urging her to stay on board with his plan.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8014
programme.desc: Wyatt issues Liam a warning when his brother asks him to keep a secret. Steffy feels an instant connection to the infant that is up for adoption.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8015
programme.desc: Unaware that she’s in physical danger, Zoe auditions for a talent show with Tiffany and Emma. Steffy makes a decision that will affect her life for years to come.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8016
programme.desc: Reese rushes onto the TV sound stage to save Zoe from the thug he owes money to. Liam feels an instant connection with the infant Steffy is adopting when he holds her for the first time.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8017
programme.desc: Flo begins to realize the severity of Reese’s actions and worries about potential consequences. Liam breaks the news to a horrified Hope that Steffy is adopting a baby girl.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8018
programme.desc: Ridge becomes overwhelmed with emotion when he learns of the addition to his family. Hope runs into Dr. Buckingham at her doctor’s office and demands answers to her questions about what transpired on Catalina Island.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8019
programme.desc: Brooke and Ridge become suspicious about the speedy process of Steffy’s adoption. Reese pleads for his daughter’s safety as he makes good and pays the money he owes.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8020
programme.desc: Brooke worries that Hope encouraged Liam to spend time with Steffy, Kelly, and the new baby. Reese shares his plans for the future with Flo, who is overwhelmed by her part in Reese’s scheme.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8021
programme.desc: Zoe is taken aback when Reese makes an announcement about their immediate future. Sparks fly and emotion runs high when Hope holds Steffy’s adopted baby daughter for the first time.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8022
programme.desc: Suspicious of the circumstances surrounding the adoption, Ridge interrogates Taylor and Steffy. Zoe comes face-to-face with Flo while searching for clues about her father’s recent departure.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8023
programme.desc: It’s a game of cat and mouse when Zoe pressures Flo with questions and Flo redirects each one. Brooke pays a surprise visit to Steffy and questions Taylor’s connection to her baby’s birth mother.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8024
programme.desc: Liam finally breaks down and expresses his feelings of guilt to Hope regarding the loss of Beth. Wyatt and Sally query Steffy after noting a resemblance between Kelly and the new baby.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8025
programme.desc: Doubting Flo’s story, Zoe pays her another visit, this time with explosive results. Unable to get the child off of her mind, Hope asks Liam to take her to Steffy’s to visit the baby.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8026
programme.desc: Zoe makes an apology to Flo before demanding more answers about her connection to Reese. Although sympathetic to Hope’s plight, Steffy worries that she is getting excessively close to Phoebe.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8027
programme.desc: Frantic that Zoe is on to her lie, Flo desperately attempts to get in touch with Reese. Liam defends Hope to Steffy when she expresses concern for Hope’s attachment to Phoebe.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8028
programme.desc: Zoe’s persistent threat to call the police or worse, to call Steffy, causes Flo to break down. Thorne blindsides Katie, who is preparing for Valentine’s Day, with an admission about their marriage.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8029
programme.desc: With Liam by her side, Hope tries to remember the details from the night that Beth died. Stunned by the tale that Flo has told, Zoe calls Reese and demands further explanation.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8030
programme.desc: Katie reveals to shocked Wyatt what Thorne gave her for Valentine’s Day. Bill uses Justin as a sounding board as he strategizes how to get his family back.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8031
programme.desc: Reese attempts to silence a furious Zoe from spilling the truth that Hope’s baby is alive! Wyatt shares with Bill, and Katie shares with Brooke and Donna, the real reason that Thorne left town.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8032
programme.desc: Flo and Reese panic when they realize that Zoe is about to tell Steffy their secret. Bill attempts to prove his loyalty to Wyatt by making him an offer that’s hard to refuse.

programme.title: The Bold & the Beautiful
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: Pluto TV Horror, eliciting every one of your worst nightmares 24/7! Curated with a selection of genre defying movies, cult classics, indies and everything to summon the terror inside of you!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Men didnt have a lock on the horror movie. There were plenty of frightful females to go around, as youll see in this salute to demonic dames.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Abominable snowmen, mole people, creatures from black lagoons. All these half-human/half-beast hybrids are here  and more!

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Creatures from out there have captured the imagination from H.G. Wells to Steven Spielberg. Heres a look at some out-of-this-world beings.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Frankenstein is probably the most famous example of a man-made monster, but a great many other creepy creations have been fashioned by men.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Robert Louis Stevensons classic tale of good and evil has been a filmic favorite since early silent days. Various portrayals of the dual doctor are examined.

programme.title: 100 Years of Horror
programme.desc: Lugosi was much more than Count Dracula, as youll see in this fascinating salute to this complex Hungarian actor.

programme.title: The Veil: Food on the Table
programme.desc: A captain returns from a sea voyage to a wife he does not love. He saves her life after she is bitten by a snake.

programme.title: The Veil: Jack the Ripper
programme.desc: A clairvoyant, in dreams and visions, sees a series of grisly murders in London's Whitechapel district.

programme.title: The Veil: The Return of Madame Vernoy
programme.desc: In August of 1927, Madame Sita Vernoy dies in a small town in India, leaving a grieving husband and a newborn son.

programme.title: The Veil: Genesis
programme.desc: The two sons of a dying farmer quarrel over the old man's will. A message from beyond the grave points the elder son to the story of Esau and Jacob in the book of Genesis.

programme.title: The Veil: Summer Heat
programme.desc: A man witnesses a robbery and murder in the apartment across the street from his own. When the police are called, it is discovered that the apartment is empty.

programme.title: The Veil: Destination Nightmare
programme.desc: A young man, badgered by his father to work in his aviation company, sees a vision of a man while on a routine air-flight. The vision tells him to go to a certain location and he does...in a trance.

programme.title: The Veil: The Crystal Ball
programme.desc: A flighty French girl leaves her lover, a young writer, to marry his boss. As a parting gift, she gives him an ornamental crystal ball.

programme.title: One Step Bey: Ordeal on Locust Street
programme.desc: A seemingly normal family is hiding a terrible secret: their son has the features of a deformed, fish-like monster.

programme.title: One Step Bey: Epilogue
programme.desc: A recovering alcoholic returns to his family from an extended stay in rehabilitation. His sobriety is put to the test, as are his beliefs in the supernatural, when his son is trapped in a cave-in.

programme.title: One Step Bey: The Devil's Laughter
programme.desc: Convicted killer John Marriott is seemingly becoming the hardest man to execute.

programme.title: One Step Bey: The Return of Mitchell Campion
programme.desc: A man visiting a small Mediterranean island is stunned when all of the island's residents recognize him and insist that he is an island resident who has returned after many years, even though he knows he has never been there before.

programme.title: One Step Bey: Twelve Hours to Live
programme.desc: After her husband storms out of the house following an argument, his wife begins having visions of him in terrible danger.

programme.title: One Step Bey: To Know the End
programme.desc: Emily MacDougall, a young woman living in England during World War II, begins to have strange hallucinations of death and destruction.

programme.title: One Step Bey: Emergency Only
programme.desc: A skeptic has his beliefs tested when events begin to unfold as a psychic had predicted.

programme.title: The Ape Man
programme.desc: A crazed scientist accidentally turns himself into a half ape, half human creature, and scrambles to find a cure.

programme.title: Transylvania 6-5000
programme.desc: Two tabloid reporters (Jeff Goldblum, Ed Begley Jr.) go to a strange land to check on rumors of monsters running amok.

channel.desc: Pluto TV Animation, full of fun, weird, action-packed and classic cartoons that everyone can enjoy!

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: New Lease on Life
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have near-death experience when Bob nearly crashes their car.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Jury Duty
programme.desc: Margaret gets called to Jury Duty but Bob has planned a holiday for them and begs her to get herself excused.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Player
programme.desc: Bob attends a personal finance seminar to help him get his hopeless financial house in order.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Getaway
programme.desc: Margaret is nominated for the Golden Arch Support award for outstanding service in the field of footcare.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Mummy's Boy
programme.desc: Bobs mother is coming all the way from England to visit him.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Gone to Seed
programme.desc: Bob decides to donate his sperm to a local sperm bank.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Candidate
programme.desc: Margaret finds herself inadvertently running for City Council when the candidate she is supporting drops out of the race.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Life Saver
programme.desc: Bob inadvertently saves the life of a suicidal man who then decides to become Bob's best friend.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: I, Bob
programme.desc: When an efficiency expert comes to assess the Inner City Dental Clinic, Bob gets side shifted out of a job.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Mastermind
programme.desc: When Bob and Margaret have a fender-bender with a local mobster, they accidentally turn him into the police.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Outward Bound
programme.desc: Bob joins his male colleagues on a canoe trip to a provincial park.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Gary
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret thought they knew everything about their next door neighbours, until Joyce and Trevor introduce them to their grown son, Gary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Very Fishy Christmas
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret experience a truly Canadian Christmas.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Tale of Two Dentists
programme.desc: Bob's business is booming, and when Margaret chips a tooth Bob tells Margaret that he is unable to give her an appointment for sometime.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Night In
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret find themselves at loose ends one evening when, to their dismay, they find that there is absolutely nothing to watch on TV.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Blood, Sweat and Tears
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret decide they need to get fit.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob's Burglary
programme.desc: While Bob and Margaret are sleeping, the local criminals, Beany and Boney clear their house - TV, video, microwave and electric toothbrush all go.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Shopping
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret, concerned at the amount they are spending in take away food and expensive local food shops, decide on an expedition to the Super Save Shopatropolis in Croydon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Holiday
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: For Peter's Sake
programme.desc: Bob's brother Peter is a successful chef who has a cooking show producing in India.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Friends for Dinner
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have been invited to Neil and Moira's for dinner, or so they think.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Love's Labours Lost
programme.desc: While listening to the radio, Bob observes his charmless young assistant Penny, inspiring him to recite odes about youth and innocence.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Dental Convention
programme.desc: The time for the annual dental convention has come. Bob is not keen on going when he sees that a colleague from his student days, Bernard Wiggins, a "loud mouthed big shot", is a featured speaker.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Discomfort of Strangers
programme.desc: Margaret fears that her relationship with Bob is getting stale after they have a petty argument.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween. It is also Bob father's birthday and his mother wants to celebrate by visiting his grave. Bob is not comfortable with this and tries to get out of it.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Neighbours
programme.desc: In this story of neighbourhood social angst, Bob is having a complex burglar alarm installed by Graham, a sad, lonely man whose confidence is lifted immeasurably by this rare sale to Bob.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Bob Gets Wired
programme.desc: When Margaret forgets to pay for some sprinkles at the local cake shop, she is hauled in as a shoplifter.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: No Trouble
programme.desc: This charming, witty animated series focuses on the ordinary lives of a middle class dentist and his foot doctor wife. Together, they tackle traumas as being burgled, going on a holiday and deciding whether or not having a child will ruin their lives.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Trouble with Mummy
programme.desc: Bob is concerned when he hears that his mothers best friend Pearl has passed on.

channel.desc: On The Case explores intriguing murder mysteries through in-depth interviews with those closest to the case and examines the forensic evidence that helped unravel the mysteries.

programme.title: On the Case: Desperate Cry
programme.desc: A mother's desperate cry for help alerts neighbors and leads to a terrifying discovery.

programme.title: On the Case: Shattered Hope
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Shelley Sikes vanishes one night after her shift, and then her abandoned, blood-streaked car is discovered on a dark roadway.

programme.title: On the Case: A Killer in the Sun
programme.desc: When Kenny Baker returns home, the backdoor is ajar and his wife, Kathy, and two-year-old son, Ryan, are nowhere to be found.

programme.title: On the Case: Same Crime Next Year
programme.desc: A teenager is found murdered on the weekend of the Daytona 500 motor race in Daytona Beach, Florida. Then, one year later, police are called to the scene of a nearly identical crime.

programme.title: On the Case: Golden Promises Broken
programme.desc: High school sweethearts disappear during a picnic and investigators spend years chasing false leads.

programme.title: On the Case: Darkness After Dawn
programme.desc: After a newlywed is found murdered in her bedroom, a search is launched for the killer that will last for three decades.

programme.title: On the Case: A Hole in their Hearts
programme.desc: A mother of three disappears from her office in broad daylight, and the case remains open for eight years until two farmers unearth a clue.

programme.title: On the Case: River of Sadness
programme.desc: A heartbreaking mystery begins with the discovery of a young woman's body floating in Washington state's Yakima River.

programme.title: On the Case: Crossed by Evil
programme.desc: Police race to find a young woman who disappeared on her way to work, but the clues they discover reveal a trail of unspeakable evil.

programme.title: On the Case: Deadly Silence
programme.desc: An 18-year-old woman never returns home after a night out with friends, and the police come up against a wall of silence that keeps them from uncovering the truth.

programme.title: On the Case: The Pastor's Wife
programme.desc: Two boys witness the brutal murder of their mother, and their story may bring her cold-blooded killer to justice 30 years later.

programme.title: On the Case: Deep Wounds
programme.desc: After Navy electrician Michael Jacobs comes home to find his wife, Suzanne, and his three-year-old son, Colin, murdered, San Diego police race to catch a serial killer who leaves behind an unimaginable calling card.

programme.title: On the Case: Betrayal in Big Cottonwood Canyon
programme.desc: A young woman is ambushed and murdered in Utah's Big Cottonwood Canyon.

programme.title: On the Case: Gone in an Instant
programme.desc: In Lenexa, Kansas, young women disappear from their apartments as police piece together evidence showing the terrifying crimes are connected.

programme.title: On the Case: Tracks of a Killer
programme.desc: Police retrace a young woman's final movements with hope that it will lead them straight to her killer.

programme.title: On The Case
programme.desc: No information available

channel.desc: What's on today on Pluto TV Advent Calendar? With daily treats ranging from your favourite actors to the best movie genres, and of course a whole sackful of festive films, you'll have to tune in to find out!

programme.title: Finding Mrs. Claus
programme.desc: When Mrs. Claus (Mira Sorvino) feels neglected by her less than attentive husband (Will Sasso), she goes to Las Vegas to help a little girl with her Christmas wish.

programme.title: Pete's Christmas
programme.desc: A put-upon teen finds himself reliving the same miserable Christmas day over and over again. Starring: Bruce Dern, Zachary Gordon, Molly Parker, Rick Roberts, Marshall Williams.

programme.title: The Christmas Consultant
programme.desc: This Lifetime Original Movie stars David Hasselhoff as a sought after consultant hired by a workaholic mother (Caroline Rhea) in an effort to get her and her family through the holidays.

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Starring Matthew Knight and Chris Kattan. Three children and their father move from California to Canada. When they go shopping at the mall, they find counterfeit cash, inadvertently help catch crooks, and make a discovery about Santa.

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
programme.desc: When Martian children become obsessed with Santa Claus, the Martian elders decide to visit our planet and bring Santa back to Mars. It's not an easy task - first, they must sort through an array of shopping mall Santas!

programme.title: Finding Mrs. Claus
programme.desc: When Mrs. Claus (Mira Sorvino) feels neglected by her less than attentive husband (Will Sasso), she goes to Las Vegas to help a little girl with her Christmas wish.

programme.title: Pete's Christmas
programme.desc: A put-upon teen finds himself reliving the same miserable Christmas day over and over again. Starring: Bruce Dern, Zachary Gordon, Molly Parker, Rick Roberts, Marshall Williams.

programme.title: The Christmas Consultant
programme.desc: This Lifetime Original Movie stars David Hasselhoff as a sought after consultant hired by a workaholic mother (Caroline Rhea) in an effort to get her and her family through the holidays.

channel.desc: Join rap superstar Xzibit and his entourage as they transform beat-up old piles of junk into the most jaw-droppingly tricked-out rides on the West Coast!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Ford Econoline/Doggie Van
programme.desc: X finds a mobile doggie grooming company owner with one mangy mutt of a car. G.A.S. pimp out the car with a top-of-the-line doggie washing station, plasma TVs, and a hydraulics door!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Jeep Grand Wagoneer
programme.desc: X pimps a Jeep owned by a contractor who's always on the go. The guys at G.A.S. give it a 'lowrider' style paint job and airbags, and add the ultimate contractors tool box to the back!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Pontiac
programme.desc: X and the guys take in a Pontiac Sunbird. This beat down convertible's getting a new lease on life as a 'Tiki-mobile', complete with Tiki graphics, binoculars and an Italian ice machine!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Crown Victoria Station Wagon
programme.desc: X surprises an nurse by turning her 1984 Ford Crown Victoria station wagon into a hot-rod style ambulance, with a CATscan-style sound system and a video monitor shaped like a defibrillator!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Chevy Cavalier
programme.desc: X and the guys turn a Chevy Cavalier into a one of a kind sparkly 'root-beer' painted creation - complete with a gumball machine, a scrapbooking station and virtual reality gaming seats!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Subaru Impreza
programme.desc: Xzibit and the crew take aim at a 1996 Subaru Impreza. They turn the owner's ride into a 'rally car' with off-road tires, authentic rally graphics and a big load of paintball gear!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Cadillac Hearse
programme.desc: X surprises the owner of a Cadillac hearse with a 'macabre mobile' complete with a velvet interior, a 42 inch monitor, and a motorized coffin that contains a barbeque grill and refrigerator!

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Daihatsu HiJet
programme.desc: Xzibit shows you how to transform your tired old car into a fully loaded cruisin' machine. Today, Wyatt gets his 1988 Daihatsu Hi-Jet pimped with a mini-fridge, guitar amp and DVD player.

programme.title: Pimp My Ride: Cadillac Sedan DeVille 1978
